title: Michael Schmid √ºbernimmt den TSV Murnau II ‚Äì ‚ÄûDa kann etwas wachsen‚Äú
creator: Andreas Mayr
description: Die Reserve des TSV Murnau hat einen neuen Trainer. Michael Schmid √ºbernimmt ab sofort f√ºr den Interimscoach Michael Adelwart.
full_description: Die Reserve des TSV Murnau hat einen neuen Trainer. Michael Schmid √ºbernimmt ab sofort f√ºr den Interimscoach Michael Adelwart. Murnau ‚Äì Den Sonntag hat Michael Schmid bereits in Oberhausen verbracht. Er sah sich zun√§chst das Spiel der Zweiten Murnauer M√§nnermannschaft an und wartete im Anschluss auf den entscheidenden Moment: Abteilungsleiter Michael Adelwart, bislang Interimstrainer, rief ihn zum Team und stellte ihn im Kreis der Fu√üballer vor. Ein ‚Äûsehr herzlicher Empfang‚Äú, berichtet Schmid. Tats√§chlich kennt er bereits den Gro√üteil der Mannschaft, da er in der Saison 2019/20 als Co-Trainer des Kreisligateams seine Laufbahn beim TSV begann. ‚ÄûDie wissen genau, wie gut das ist, wenn du in der A-Klasse so einen Trainer kriegst. Das haben andere nicht‚Äú, lobt Spartenchef Adelwart. Die interne L√∂sung wurde in den vergangenen Tagen ausgelotet. Daf√ºr brauchte es ein paar Verschiebungen innerhalb des TSV-Gebildes. Schmid, den alle nur ‚ÄûMigga‚Äú nennen, gab die U14 ab, mit der er auf Rang drei der Kreisliga steht. ‚ÄûDiese Mannschaft ist mir ans Herz gewachsen‚Äú, sagt der 45-j√§hrige Peitinger. Sein Sohn spielt in dieser Auswahl, die vorigen Herbst in der U13-Bezirksoberliga √ºberraschte und die Scouts der Gro√üclubs anzog. Den Kader √ºbernimmt nun Caroline Rieger, bislang Bayernliga-Trainerin der U15 mit Stefan Schubert. Sie k√ºmmert sich nun schwerpunktm√§√üig um den j√ºngeren C-Jugend-Jahrgang 2008 und soll ihn an das Bayernliga-Level heranf√ºhren. ‚ÄûF√ºr die Jungs kann nichts besseres passieren‚Äú, betont Schmid, der neben der Zweiten auch noch die B-Jugend betreut. Rieger und Schmid ‚Äûhaben es im Sinne des Vereins gemacht, das ist das Coole daran‚Äú, sagt Adelwart. Schmid habe nicht gez√∂gert, als er ihm Team zwei anbot. ‚ÄûEr ist der Typ, der den Umbruch mit vollziehen kann ‚Äì von der A2 bis zu den Ersten Herren.‚Äú Der Peitinger gilt als loyaler Zuarbeiter mit gro√üer Arbeitsmoral. Egal ob Senioren, Kleinfeld oder B-Jugend: Er packt √ºberall an und hat mit seinem umg√§nglichen wie kommunikativen Stil Erfolg. Seine B-Jugend liegt derzeit ungeschlagen auf Rang eins, kann am Sonntag mit einem Sieg den Titel in der Bezirksoberliga klarmachen. Den Wechsel zur√ºck in den Seniorenbereich h√§lt er f√ºr ‚Äûkeinen leichten Schritt‚Äú, weil er doch so gerne im Nachwuchs trainiert und geformt hat. Gerade die Perspektive der Zweiten hat Schmid letztendlich gereizt. ‚ÄûWas im Nachwuchs anschiebt, ist gewaltig. Du kriegst die n√§chsten Jahre so viel Qualit√§t raus.‚Äú Der TSV m√∂chte mit der Reserve so etwas wie einen internen, zweiten Bildungsweg installieren. Sprich, Spieler aufbauen, die den Sprung in die Erste Mannschaft nicht auf Anhieb packen, f√∂rdern und weiterentwickeln. Wie sein Vorg√§nger Stefan Bierling wird und will er sich eng mit A-Jugend-Coach Dennis Destek sowie M√§nner-Trainer Tim Schmid (sie kennen sich schon lange aus Peitinger Tagen) abstimmen. ‚ÄûDa kann etwas wachsen‚Äú, sagt der 45-J√§hrige. Momentan habe das Team ein ‚Äûschwieriges Jahr‚Äú zu √ºberbr√ºcken, da die Besetzung um den harten wie zuverl√§ssigen Kern jede Woche wechselt. Immerhin lastet kein Druck auf Mannschaft und Coach, weil sich der TSV weit genug vom Abstieg entfernt platziert hat. ‚ÄûEin √úbergangsjahr‚Äú nennt Schmid den Rest der Saison. Genug Zeit also, um Strukturen f√ºr die Zukunft zu schaffen. (Andreas Mayr)

title: Report: ¬£140k-a-week star may have already decided on Chelsea exit amid rumoured Tottenham talks

content: Photo by Marco Canoniero/LightRocket via Getty Images Tottenham-linked Antonio Rudiger may have already decided to leave Chelsea with the current contract offer ¬£60,000-a-week short of his demands. That‚Äôs according to The Athletic, who claim that Rudiger is demanding ¬£200,000-a-week to stay at Chelsea. Chelsea aren‚Äôt willing to pay that kind of money and are only offering ¬£140,000-a-week with Rudiger‚Äôs contract expiring next summer. Neither Rudiger nor Chelsea are willing to change their stance, and one source claimed that Rudiger has already decided to go. Newcastle Just Sacked Steve Bruce For‚Ä¶ ROONEY?!BridTV6077Newcastle Just Sacked Steve Bruce For‚Ä¶ ROONEY?!886387886387center13872 Rudiger‚Äôs advisors have started speaking to potential suitors in what would be a blow for Chelsea. The 28-year-old has excelled under Thomas Tuchel, becoming one of the Premier League‚Äôs top defenders over the last nine months or so. Do Tottenham really have hope of signing Rudiger? Tottenham wanted to sign Rudiger in 2020, but he rejected a late move across London. Hopes of resurrecting a move really gained traction last week. Gianluca Di Marzio claimed that Rudiger is in talks with Tottenham, along with a host of other clubs, ahead of leaving Chelsea. Photo by Giuseppe Maffia/NurPhoto via Getty Images That would be talks with Rudiger‚Äôs representatives rather than the player himself, but a move to Tottenham still seems unlikely. If Rudiger said no last season, would he be any more likely to say yes this time? Tottenham are a long way off Chelsea right now, so a move to North London wouldn‚Äôt represent a step forward. Add in the ¬£200,000-a-week demands and it just doesn‚Äôt seem likely that Tottenham will come up with a deal to sign Rudiger. title: Opinion: Fonseca could quickly end Arsenal's pursuit of Hazard-like star with Newcastle reunion
creator: Olly Dawes
description: Newcastle United could be closing in on making Paulo Fonseca their new manager ‚Äì and that just makes their interest in Manor Solomon even more... The post Opinion: Fonseca could quickly end Arsenal's pursuit of Hazard-like star with Newcastle reunion appeared first on HITC.
content: Photo by Gabriele Maltinti/Getty Images Newcastle United could be closing in on making Paulo Fonseca their new manager ‚Äì and that just makes their interest in Manor Solomon even more realistic. The Magpies have parted ways with Steve Bruce and must now find a replacement for him as they attempt to properly start their new era. A number of names have been linked with the job, but it now sounds like Fonseca is the favourite. Fonseca to Newcastle? Reports from The Telegraph emerged last week suggesting that Fonseca is the preferred appointment of Amanda Staveley. Newcastle Just Sacked Steve Bruce For‚Ä¶ ROONEY?!BridTV6077Newcastle Just Sacked Steve Bruce For‚Ä¶ ROONEY?!886387886387center13872 The Telegraph then added that Fonseca could pen a ¬£6million-a-year deal with Newcastle. Sacked by Roma at the end of last season, Fonseca is out of work and available to come in now. An attack-minded manager, Fonseca would be a far cry from Steve Bruce but still a gamble ‚Äì especially with this Newcastle defence. Fabrizio Romano has now told Que Golazo that Fonseca is ready to accept a contract offer and take the Newcastle job in the coming days. Photo by Ahmad Mora/DeFodi Images via Getty Images Reunion with Arsenal target Solomon? If the Fonseca rumours are true, then Newcastle being linked with Shakhtar Donetsk ace Manor Solomon makes a lot of sense. Walla in Israel reported last week that Newcastle have added Solomon to their wish list for January. Solomon was signed at Shakhtar under Fonseca, who called the Israeli winger ‚Äòwonderful‚Äô. Arsenal have wanted Solomon for a while. The Guardian reported in January that Arsenal fancied signing the 22-year-old, who has been likened to Eden Hazard. Sport Arena then claimed that a ¬£17million summer bid was rejected, with Arsenal unable to bring Solomon to North London in the end. Fonseca could look to make Solomon his first Newcastle signing in a big reunion, adding more creativity and flair to his attacking options. In the process, Fonseca could instantly kill off Arsenal‚Äôs hopes of landing Solomon, bringing an end to a long-term pursuit. Photo by Marco Canoniero/LightRocket via Getty Images The post Opinion: Fonseca could quickly end Arsenal's pursuit of Hazard-like star with Newcastle reunion appeared first on HITC.

title: Report: Two Celtic summer signings already considering loans, Postecoglou hasn't picked them
creator: Olly Dawes
description: Celtic talents Osaze Urhoghide and Liam Shaw could head out on loan in January as they are considered to be nowhere near Ange Postecoglou‚Äôs side.... The post Report: Two Celtic summer signings already considering loans, Postecoglou hasn't picked them appeared first on HITC.
content: Photo by Catherine Ivill/Getty Images Celtic talents Osaze Urhoghide and Liam Shaw could head out on loan in January as they are considered to be nowhere near Ange Postecoglou‚Äôs side. That‚Äôs according to The Scottish Sun, who claim that the two summer signings are fighting for their futures at Parkhead. Both Shaw and Urhoghide were out of contract at Sheffield Wednesday in the summer and decided to leave. Celtic saw potential in both players and signed them in bargain deals thanks to cross-border contract rules. Anton McElhone‚Äôs influence at Celtic is already being feltBridTV6133Anton McElhone‚Äôs influence at Celtic is already being felt887861887861centerUCqUPn73T2WxGyzCdtLe8m7g67 Hail Hail (Youtube)https://yt3.ggpht.com/ytc/AAUvwng3RIc-bAXurA5yt1Vj63uuVOBD1RQ9n6j_XKhD=s800-c-k-c0x00ffffff-no-rj13872 However, neither player has emerged into the Celtic first team this season and are thought to be short of Postecoglou‚Äôs plans right now. That may lead both players to head out on loan in January, especially as Postecoglou wants more signings in January. Urhoghide and Shaw yet to feature for Celtic Urhoghide showed talent as a centre back at Sheffield Wednesday but didn‚Äôt look entirely convincing in Celtic‚Äôs pre-season action. The 21-year-old is one for the future, but hasn‚Äôt even made it off the bench in a first-team game for Celtic. Photo by George Wood/Getty Images Urhoghide has at least been on the bench for all of Celtic‚Äôs European games this season, but doesn‚Äôt look like challenging Carl Starfelt or Cameron Carter-Vickers any time soon. As for Shaw, the midfielder he has only been on the bench for one league game this season. Shaw may benefit from a loan spell with another Scottish club just to get more minutes. After all, he only actually played 24 times for Wednesday. Selling either of them earlier would be a strange decision, but it‚Äôs hard too see them playing at Celtic any time soon. Photo by Steve Welsh/Getty Images The post Report: Two Celtic summer signings already considering loans, Postecoglou hasn't picked them appeared first on HITC.

content: Photo by Nick Taylor/Liverpool FC/Liverpool FC via Getty Images Elijah Dixon-Bonner had an evening to remember as the Liverpool youngster bagged a brace in the Reds‚Äô U-23 clash against Blackburn Rovers. The 20-year-old midfielder was key to the Merseyside club securing a point as the former Arsenal academy star scored two fine goals for Liverpool. The London-born prospect has been involved with first-team training this season. The youngster has been a regular for the club at U-23 level this season. Yet Dixon-Bonner is yet to play for the senior squad this campaign, with Liverpool set to take on Championship side Preston North End tomorrow in the League Cup. Indeed, that fixture could see Dixon-Bonner make his first senior appearance of the season if the youngster travels to Deepdale with Klopp and company. Nach dem Abstieg des FC Schalke 04 dachte Ozan Kabak wohl, es k√∂nne nur besser werden. Am Samstag musste er jedoch schmerzlich eines Besseren belehrt werden. FC Schalke 04: Kabak geht mit Norwich unter Bislang muss Ozan Kabak das Gef√ºhl haben, er durchlebe die Horror-Saison mit dem FC Schalke 04 erneut. Nur das dieses Mal seine Mannschaft Norwich City hei√üt. Mit gerade einmal zwei Punkten im Gep√§ck reisten die ‚ÄûCanaries‚Äú zum Titelfavoriten FC Chelsea. Die Leighabe des FC Schalke 04, Ozan Kabak, geht mit 0:7 gegen den FC Chelsea baden. Foto: imago images/PA Images Die schwierige Aufgabe des Tabellenletzten entpuppte sich am Ende als unl√∂sbar. Die Mannschaft von Ex-BVB-Trainer Thomas Tuchel schickte Norwich nach 90 Minuten mit einer 7:0-Klatsche unter die Dusche. Ozan Kabak hatte √ºber die gesamte Distanz hinweg keine Chance gegen die schnelle Offensive der ‚ÄûBlues‚Äú. Insbesondere Callum Hudson-Odoi und Mason Mount lie√üen die Schalke-Leihgabe alt aussehen. Was Kabak hinten nicht verhindern konnte, da scheiterte ein anderer ehemaliger S04-Star vorne. Auch Teemu Pukki konnte seiner Mannschaft mit einem Treffer keine Verschnaufpause bescheren. ----------------------- Das ist Ozan Kabak: Geboren am 25. M√§rz 2000 Wurde bei Galatasaray Istanbul ausgebildet Wechselte im Januar 2019 f√ºr 11 Millionen Euro zum VfB Stuttgart Nur ein halbes Jahr sp√§ter ging er dann f√ºr 15 Millionen Euro zum FC Schalke 04 Sein Vertrag auf Schalke l√§uft noch bis 2024 2021 wurde er f√ºr ein halbes Jahr an den FC Liverpool verliehen ‚Äì die Reds zogen die Kaufoption allerdings nicht ----------------------- Der Pottklub wird das Ergebnis ebenfalls mit schmerzverzerrtem Gesicht zur Kenntnis genommen haben. Schalke-Hoffnung verdunkelt sich Beim S04 lag die Hoffnung darin, dass Kabak durch gute Leistungen neue Arbeitgeber anlocken k√∂nnte. Doch bei derlei Ergebnissen werden die Verantwortlichen vergebens auf gute Angebote warten. ----------------------- Noch mehr S04-News: FC Schalke 04: Mannschaft mit besonderer Aktion ‚Äì Fans sind begeistert! ‚ÄûG√§nsehaut pur‚Äú FC Schalke 04: Heftige Schl√§gerei! title: Man Utd players tell Ole Gunnar Solskjaer that he is the ‚Äòissue‚Äô
creator: Joe Williams
description: The Red Devils have now only ‚Ä¶ The post Man Utd players tell Ole Gunnar Solskjaer that he is the ‚Äòissue‚Äô appeared first on Football365.
content: At least one Manchester United player reportedly told Ole Gunnar Solskjaer he is the ‚Äòissue‚Äô after their 5-0 drubbing by Liverpool on Sunday. That humiliating result at home to their arch-rivals means the Red Devils have now only taken one point from their last four matches in the Premier League. United were poor throughout as Mohamed Salah hit a hat-trick, with goals from Naby Keita and Diogo Jota adding to the embarrassment for Solskjaer and his players. Ronaldo leads the ‚Äòworst‚Äô Premier League XI of the weekend Solskjaer said the defeat saw United hit ‚Äúrock bottom‚Äù but believes he is the right man to continue at the helm. There are already rumours that he could be replaced before their next match against Tottenham in the Premier League with Antonio Conte and Zinedine Zidane among the names linked. And now The Athletic write that Solskjaer‚Äôs speech in the dressing room after their match against Liverpool was badly received by some of his players. The Athletic claim: ‚ÄòSolskjaer asked his team for their thoughts on the issues causing United to leak chances week after week. More than one concluded that the answer was the man posing the question. ‚ÄòRecriminations abound when sides are on the slide, but the sense that Solskjaer is not the manager to lead United on has taken hold for a section of his squad over the past month. They admire his manner, his commitment, and public protection but doubts are growing about his sophistication to challenge Pep Guardiola, Thomas Tuchel and Jurgen Klopp.‚Äô Meanwhile, former Man Utd goalkeeper Mark Bosnich insisted the result against Liverpool was ‚Äúdevastating‚Äù for the Red Devils. ‚ÄúIt was a disaster. There is no other word for it,‚Äù Bosnich told Sky Sports News. ‚ÄúIt was devastating. There was a time during the first half that it was ugly but I thought it was going to get to six, seven or eight. ‚ÄúIt is a very dark day, there is no doubt about it. He is an ex-team-mate and I want him to do well, but I don‚Äôt think he had any other choice than to say that (he is still the right man). ‚ÄúIf this continues there is no other choice for the board ‚Äì we don‚Äôt know whether Manchester United have already approached people about the possibility of taking over. ‚ÄúThere are three tough games coming up ‚Äì Tottenham away, Atalanta and then Manchester City before the international break. If they lose those three games, which right now is a massive possibility, I don‚Äôt really see there being any other choice.‚Äù ¬† The post Man Utd players tell Ole Gunnar Solskjaer that he is the ‚Äòissue‚Äô appeared first on Football365.

title: Advocaat Maradona: ‚ÄúSlechte medische behandeling is oorzaak van zijn dood‚Äù

description: Volgens Matias Morla, de voormalige advocaat van Argentijnse voetballegende Diego Maradona, is de slechte medische behandeling die Maradona kreeg in zijn laatste levensuren de oorzaak van zijn overlijden op 25 november 2020. title: Kerevi, McMahon withdraw from Wallabies' European tour
full_description: Rugby Australia chief executive Andy Marinos said it was "hugely disappointing" that Japan-based duo Samu Kerevi and Sean McMahon had withdrawn from the Wallabies' European tour. The Suntory Sungoliath pair had been included in coach Dave Rennie's squad for next month's internationals against Scotland, England and Wales. "The players have made the decision to withdraw, for personal and or other reasons," Marinos told the Sydney Morning Herald. "Samu has cited the fact he has been on the road for a long time, from the sevens, through to the Olympics, through to where he is. He has cited his physical and mental wellbeing. "Obviously, they're going to go into another hard-ish bubble overseas. Sean just made the decision that he would rather withdraw himself from the tour." Kerevi returned to the Wallabies squad in September for the first time since the 2019 World Cup and played in Rugby Championship wins over South Africa and Argentina, but missed Saturday's narrow victory over Japan due to an ankle injury. McMahon featured once from the bench since returning to the squad at the start of October after an almost-four year absence. "From our side, it's hugely disappointing," said Marinos. "It's disappointing for the fact that we've backed these players, in terms of giving them another opportunity. "We just expected a more honest approach, right from the beginning, if it was not their intention to travel. "If there was an inclination they were not going to tour, we would have appreciated it a lot earlier. At the time, when they were told they were going to be selected on that tour." Australia will play Scotland at Murrayfield on Nov. 7 before taking on England at Twickenham six days later. They complete their tour in Cardiff against Wales on Nov. 20. (Reporting by Michael Church, Editing by Peter Rutherford)

title: Ousmane Dembele agent 'contacts Newcastle United, Juventus'
description: The agent of Barcelona winger Ousmane Dembele reportedly makes contact with Juventus and Newcastle United regarding a potential transfer in 2022.
full_description: Despite enjoying regular game time at Camp Nou during the last campaign, Dembele is yet to make a competitive appearance in 2021-22 as he continues to endure a troubled spell with the Catalan giants. Nevertheless, with just over eight months remaining on his contract, Barcelona have been desperately to extend the Frenchman's contract past the end of this season. According to Sport , a renewal is currently not an option with his representatives, who appear to be ready to take advantage of the player's future availability. Ahead of being allowed to hold official talks in 2022, the report suggests that contact has already been made with the likes of Juventus and Newcastle. Barcelona are said to be struggling to hold formal discussions regarding Dembele's future, leaving the La Liga side in a position where they will have to be open to a cut-price sale in January.

title: Nuno orders Tottenham January bid for former Wolves target Benitez also wants
creator: Jonny Whitfield
description: Tottenham manager Nuno Espirito Santo has asked the club to step up interest in a star target also wanted by Everton, a report has claimed The post Nuno orders Tottenham January bid for former Wolves target Benitez also wants appeared first on TEAMtalk.
content: Tottenham boss Nuno Espirito Santo wants his side to prepare a January transfer bid for Stoke defender Harry Souttar, according to a report. The 23-year-old has established himself as an impressive figure for the Potters, despite it taking him a while. Following his arrival in 2016, he only made a few Premier League bench appearances before their relegation. From there, a loan spell at Ross County and two at Fleetwood followed for the Australia international. Since the start of last season, though, Souttar has played 51 of 60 Championship outings for Stoke. As such, interest in his services has emerged ‚Äì and it has come from the Premier League. Previous reports have claimed that Everton are looking into signing him. Tottenham‚Äôs interest has also been mentioned. According to Football Insider, though, Spurs boss Nuno has now stepped up his side‚Äôs chase for Souttar. He has sanctioned a move for him and wants his club to prepare a January bid for the player. This follows multiple scouting trips to watch Souttar, the report adds. Former Wolves boss Nuno green-lighted a move for the centre-back when he was at Molineux. Now, it is Spurs, Everton and Aston Villa who are in the race to sign him. Football Insider adds that Stoke are ‚Äòbraced‚Äô for January offers for their defender. Souttar, born in Aberdeen, qualified for Australian allegiance and has nine caps on the international stage. He has a fantastic record for his country too, scoring six goals, while he featured at the Tokyo Olympics this summer. The centre-half is also in good form for his club, who sit ninth in the Championship but are level on points with sixth-placed Middlesbrough. Souttar move presents Tottenham similarity Should Spurs sign Souttar, they would be raiding a Championship club for a defender for the second time in two years. They signed Joe Rodon from Swansea in the summer 2020 transfer window. He is battling his way into the team. The likes of Cristian Romero and Davinson Sanchez are first-choice picks for Nuno. Rodon, meanwhile, has played in the Europa Conference League matches. He is also a regular Wales international, despite his lack of club minutes. title: WBBL "Experience Will Definitely Count" When Playing For India: Mandhana
description: Sydney Thunder opening batter Smriti Mandhana believes the participation of Indian players in the Women's Big Bash League (WBBL) will definitely count for something once they are back playing for...
full_description: Sydney Thunder opening batter Smriti Mandhana believes the participation of Indian players in the Women's Big Bash League (WBBL) will definitely count for something once they are back playing for India. In the ongoing WBBL season, there are eight Indian players who are taking part -- Shafali Verma, Mandhana, Jemimah Rodrigues, Poonam Yadav, Radha Yadav, Richa Ghosh, Harmanpreet Kaur , and Deepti Sharma. "This year we had a window and we were already here and had done our 14 days quarantine. It's better to stay and play some more cricket rather than go back," the Sydney Morning Herald quoted Mandhana as saying. "We have a World Cup coming up and we don't have a BBL in our country, so it will be of benefit and a lot of experience for the eight girls in the comp and that experience will definitely count when we are back playing for India," she added. Before the WBBL, the Indian players were in Australia to take part in the multi-format series, where the Indian side ended up losing, but not after showing a fighting spirit in all the matches. Promoted The one-off pink-ball Test was completely dominated by the Indian side, but it ended as a draw. Mandhana was adjudged as Player of the Match in that game after registering a fantastic century in the first innings.

full_description: 10:21 ‚Äì FC Barcelona gaat in de komende maand alles op alles zetten om het contract van Ousmane Demb√©l√© (24) te verlengen. De Catalaanse grootmacht geeft zichzelf nog tot eind november om te kijken of de aflopende verbintenis van de Franse aanvaller open te breken en zo een transfervrij vertrek in de komende zomer te voorkomen. Dat weet El Mundo Deportivo althans. De krant spreekt van een 'grote operatie' om Demb√©l√© te behouden voor de club, ondanks alle financi√´le moeilijkheden. De buitenspeler moet wel een deel van zijn salaris inleveren, maar in plaats daarvan worden wel lucratieve bonussen opgenomen in het contract van de blessuregevoelige buitenspeler. Demb√©l√© speelde dit seizoen nog geen minuut bij FC Barcelona, maar de Catalanen willen hem toch dolgraag behouden. Als het binnen nu en een maand niet lukt om zijn in 2022 aflopende contract te verlengen, dan is de kans groot dat de club hem in de winterstop nog probeert te verkopen. Lees ook: 'FC Barcelona hoopt Demb√©l√© te slijten met slimme actie' Demb√©l√© maakte in het verleden bij Borussia Dortmund grote indruk. Als jonge jongen maakte hij tien doelpunten voor Dortmund in vijftig wedstrijden. Voor Barcelona heeft hij inmiddels meer dan honderd wedstrijden achter zijn naam staan, waarin hij dertig keer trefzeker was, al heeft hij zijn miljoenenbelofte nooit √©cht kunnen inlossen. title: Preview: Celta Vigo vs. Real Sociedad - prediction, team news, lineups
description: Sports Mole previews Thursday's La Liga clash between Celta Vigo and Real Sociedad, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
full_description: Seeking to cement their position atop the La Liga rankings, Real Sociedad travel to Celta Vigo for Thursday's top-flight battle. The hosts eased to a 3-0 success over whipping boys Getafe last time out, while Sociedad played out a 2-2 draw with reigning champions Atletico Madrid. ¬© Reuters Finally marching to some long-awaited victories after a nightmare start to the season, Celta Vigo barely needed to hit second gear to put three unanswered goals past basement side Getafe and continue their rise up the rankings at the weekend. After a goalless opening 45 minutes, Santi Mina and Iago Aspas struck in quick succession for Celta before the former put the cherry on the icing on the cake in the 73rd minute, with that triumph against the 10 men of Getafe representing Los Celestes' third win from five in La Liga. That run does include a pair of 1-0 defeats to Elche and Sevilla earlier this month, though, as Celta occupy 14th spot in the table after 10 games, but their current form is a marked improvement on their 0-1-4 record after five games of the new season. With two talented forwards in Aspas and Mina leading the line, Eduardo Coudet 's side have amassed 10 goals from as many games this season - the joint-highest in the bottom half of the table - but only three of those strikes have come at home, where they have lost four out of five so far this term. ¬© Reuters Travelling to the Wanda Metropolitano for the first true test of their mettle since their opening-day defeat to Barcelona, Sociedad were in dreamland for an hour against Atletico Madrid, as Alexander Sorloth and Alexander Isak put them two goals to the good in the capital. However, Atletico fought back like true champions to take a point as Luis Suarez bagged a brace in front of the home crowd, forcing Sociedad to settle for their fifth draw from nine games in all competitions, but a whole 19 teams are still below the visitors in the table. Indeed, Imanol Alguacil 's side currently hold a one-point lead over Real Madrid and Sevilla, but both of those teams have a game in hand, and Sociedad could be knocked off top spot before their trip to Celta depending on what transpires on Wednesday. The league leaders are now unbeaten in 12 games across all tournaments since their opening-day loss to Barca, though, and they have scored at least two goals in four of their five La Liga road matches this term, with the two Alexanders now out to prove their worth to Alguacil after scoring their first goals of the league season against Atletico. Sociedad eased to a 4-1 win on Celta's turf before marching to a 2-1 success on home soil during the 2020-21 campaign, although Aspas always seems to have a goal in him against this week's visitors, leading the way with 10 strikes in this fixture. ¬© Reuters Celta boss Coudet is hopeful that Renato Tapia will recover from his calf injury in time to feature this week, but Jose Fontan 's knee sprain is set to keep him out of action a little while longer. The hosts have no fresh concerns to deal with from the weekend, but winger Brais Mendez is walking a tightrope on four bookings and will miss the weekend's meeting with Rayo Vallecano if he is cautioned here. Tapia will challenge Fran Beltran for the holding midfield role if fit enough, but other than that it should be as you were for Celta, with Arsenal flop Denis Suarez operating behind Mina and Aspas. Meanwhile, Sociedad continue to cope with a hefty list of injuries, with Mikel Oyarzabal , Nacho Monreal , Jon Guridi , Diego Rico and Carlos Fernandez are set to remain out a little while longer. Asier Illarramendi is stepping up his training after a thigh injury but remains a doubt for the contest, as does Ander Barrenetxea , while Martin Zubimendi did not train on Monday owing to his hip problem. Alguacil lined up with a three-man defence against Atletico but ought to return to a four here, with Robin Le Normand expected to be fine despite taking a stomp to the foot against Atletico. Celta Vigo possible starting lineup: Dituro; Mallo, Aidoo, Murillo, Galan; Beltran; Mendez, Suarez, Nolito; Aspas, Mina Real Sociedad possible starting lineup: Remiro; Gorosabel, Le Normand, Elustondo, Aihen; Merino, Zubeldia; Portu, Silva, Januzaj; Isak Celta's home record makes for bleak reading before the visit of the league leaders, but Coudet will be hoping to see Aspas and Mina pick up where they left off after a confidence-boosting win over Getafe. However, Sociedad will be out for blood after throwing away two points against Atletico and know how to find the back of the net away from home, so we expect Alguacil's side to remain atop the rankings with a hard-fought success.

description: Alors que la LFP s'est prononc√©e sur de premi√®res sanctions envers l'ASSE, elle n'a pas encore rendu son verdict pour l'OM apr√®s les incidents contre le PSG lors du Classico.
full_description: L'Olympique de Marseille peut trembler. Hier, la commission de discipline de la Ligue de Football Professionnel (LFP) rendait un premier verdict √† titre conservatoire pour l'ASSE. Suite aux √©v√®nements ayant entour√© l'avant-match contre Angers, le Stade Geoffroy-Guichard sera √† huis clos pour la r√©ception de Clermont, et le parcage visiteur ferm√© pour le d√©placement √† Metz, en attendant un nouveau jugement. Du c√¥t√© de l'OM, le choc face au PSG a lui aussi √©t√© le th√©√¢tre de plusieurs incidents : fumig√®nes, jets de projectiles, intrusion sur le terrain d'un supporter ... de quoi donner du fil √† retordre √† la LFP qui, selon les informations de l'√âquipe , va attendre le 3 novembre prochain pour statuer d√©finitivement sur la situation. Deux issues sont donc imaginables : soit la LFP frappe fort et retire le point de sursis qui plane au-dessus de la t√™te des Phoc√©ens, soit elle d√©cide de ne pas le retirer, jugeant les actes du Classico moins grave que ceux d'Angers et Nice. Dans les deux cas, elle se retrouverait perdante. En effet, en cas de retrait, elle influencerait directement le classement final de la Ligue 1, ce qui pourrait causer du tort en cas d'√©cart infime en fin de saison, et une possible qualification europ√©enne enlev√©e des mains de l'OM. En cas de non-retrait, cela pourrait √™tre consid√©r√© comme un aveu de faiblesse, une incapacit√© √† frapper fort et garder de la continuit√© dans ces d√©cisions. Du c√¥t√© de l'OM, on appuie sur le fait que les incidents du PSG sont moins graves que ceux face √† Nice ou Angers, pour tenter d'√©viter le retrait de points, comme l'explique l'√âquipe . Surtout, la LFP a appr√©ci√© la communication en amont de l'OM, que ce soit via Pablo Longoria, Dimitri Payet, ou encore les diff√©rents messages pass√©s par le club. De quoi amadouer la commission de discipline ? Rendez-vous le 3 novembre pour en savoir plus. Suite aux incidents du Classico OM - PSG, la LFP n'a pas encore rendu son jugement, contrairement √† l'ASSE sanctionn√©e d'un match √† huis clos, un probl√®me existe. Les deux sanctions pourraient √™tre mal interpr√©t√©es par le club.

title: Marek Kania ma szansƒô na wystƒôp w igrzyskach w Pekinie. Piƒôkna historia
content: To mo≈ºe byƒá jedna z najwiƒôkszych sensacji tej zimy w polskim sporcie. Zapewne niewielu kibic√≥w kojarzy Marka Kaniƒô. Tymczasem 22-letni ch≈Çopak ma szansƒô wyjazdu na zimowe igrzyska olimpijskie do Pekinu w ≈Çy≈ºwiarstwie szybkim, choƒá jeszcze rok temu chcia≈Ç zrezygnowaƒá z panczen√≥w, by skupiƒá siƒô na rolkach. Otrzyma≈Ç jednak szansƒô od Polskiego ZwiƒÖzku ≈Åy≈ºwiarstwa Szybkiego i szybko sta≈Ç siƒô czo≈Çowym sprinterem w kraju.
full_description: Sprinterzy to w tej chwili najmocniejsza grupa w polskiej kadrze w ≈Çy≈ºwiarstwie szybkim. Nieoczekiwanie na jednƒÖ z czo≈Çowych jej postaci wyrasta 22-letni... wrotkarz Marek Kania. Szybciej od niego w tym sezonie w Polsce pojecha≈Ç na 500 m tylko Damian ≈ªurek, a na 1000 m Piotr Michalski. Kania znakomicie spisywa≈Ç siƒô w zawodach w Inzell, gdzie nasza reprezentacja przebywa≈Ça na zgrupowaniu. Pobi≈Ç on wyra≈∫nie rekordy ≈ºyciowe na 500 i 1000 m. Na tym pierwszym dystansie uzyska≈Ç 35,34 sek. i w tej chwili to jest 37. wynik na ≈õwiecie. Na 1000 m jego rekord to 1.09,69 i to jest 41. wynik na ≈õwiecie. - Nie powiedzia≈Çbym, ≈ºe jestem objawieniem sezonu - przyzna≈Ç skromnie Kania, kt√≥rego chwali≈Ç sam Zbigniew Br√≥dka w rozmowie z Onet Sport , m√≥wiƒÖc: Na 1000 m mamy wielu dobrych zawodnik√≥w, a do tego pojawi≈Ç siƒô jeszcze wrotkarz Marek Kania, kt√≥ry mocno zaznaczy≈Ç w Inzell swojƒÖ obecno≈õƒá. Jazda na ≈Çy≈ºwach nie jest dla niego nowo≈õciƒÖ. W≈Ça≈õciwie od dziecka zajmuje siƒô niƒÖ r√≥wnolegle z wrotkami. Tyle, ≈ºe do tej pory nie mia≈Ç w panczenach zbyt dobrych wynik√≥w. - Tak naprawdƒô wszystko ruszy≈Ço w ubieg≈Çym sezonie. A teraz wystrzeli≈Çem z wynikami. Nie wiem jednak, na co postawiƒô. Nie chcƒô decydowaƒá. Na pewno latem to bƒôdƒÖ rolki, a zimƒÖ ≈Çy≈ºwy. P√≥ki jestem w stanie to godziƒá i p√≥ki wychodzi mi to na dobre - a na to wyglƒÖda - to nie chcia≈Çbym wybieraƒá, tylko chcia≈Çbym ≈õcigaƒá siƒô w obu tych dyscyplinach. SƒÖ zawodnicy, kt√≥rzy odnosili sukcesy zar√≥wno we wrotkach, jak i w ≈Çy≈ºwiarstwie szybkim - powiedzia≈Ç Kania. Przed tym sezonem do≈ÇƒÖczy≈Ç on do kadry sprinter√≥w prowadzonej przez Tuomasa Nieminena. - W ubieg≈Çym roku chcia≈Çem ko≈Ñczyƒá z ≈Çy≈ºwami i by≈Ç plan, by skupiƒá siƒô tylko na rolkach. Przyjecha≈Çem na mistrzostwa Polski w ≈Çy≈ºwiarstwie szybkim. To mia≈Çy byƒá moje ostatnie zawody w tej dyscyplinie. Chcia≈Çem zdobyƒá trochƒô punkt√≥w dla klubu. Zrobi≈Çem jednak niez≈Çe wyniki i dostrzeg≈Ç to Konrad Nied≈∫wiedzki. Zaproponowa≈Ç mi wsp√≥lne zgrupowanie z kadrƒÖ sprinter√≥w. Skorzysta≈Çem z tego i trenowa≈Çem z nimi. Pokaza≈Çem siƒô z dobrej strony i zosta≈Çem wciƒÖgniƒôty do reprezentacji - opowiada≈Ç Kania swojƒÖ niezwyk≈ÇƒÖ historiƒô. Na pewno zawodnik ten ma wielki potencja≈Ç. Potrafi wygrywaƒá z Piotrem Michalskim czy Arturem Nogalem, kt√≥rzy ca≈Çe dotychczasowe ≈ºycie po≈õwiƒôcili ≈Çy≈ºwiarstwu. To pokazuje, ≈ºe Kania ma moc w nogach. - Rzeczywi≈õcie, kilka razy s≈Çysza≈Çem ju≈º, ≈ºe mam du≈ºƒÖ moc w nogach. Mam jednak braki techniczne. To jednak normalne, bo nie trenowa≈Çem panczen√≥w tak d≈Çugo, jak nasi najlepsi zawodnicy. Pewnie, ≈ºe nie jest dobrze, ≈ºe mam braki techniczne, ale z drugiej strony to oznacza, ≈ºe jest co poprawiaƒá, a tym samym urywaƒá cenne czƒô≈õci sekundy z czasu. Dlatego te≈º wiele os√≥b namawia mnie, bym ca≈Çkowicie skupi≈Ç siƒô na ≈Çy≈ºwach - powiedzia≈Ç. Kania we wrotkach do tej pory nie odnosi≈Ç wielkich sukces√≥w. Jak sam przyzna≈Ç, raczej bywa≈Ç w ko≈Ñcu stawki. Prze≈Çom przyszed≈Ç w tym roku. W mistrzostwach Europy zajƒÖ≈Ç dwukrotnie dziewiƒÖte miejsce. W kwalifikacjach potrafi≈Ç jednak uzyskaƒá czwarty czas. - Oba sporty sƒÖ dla mnie r√≥wne ciekawe, choƒá pewnie dla kibica rolki sƒÖ atrakcyjniejsze. Tu mamy do czynienia z bezpo≈õredniƒÖ rywalizacjƒÖ. Jest walka na trasie. SƒÖ przepychanki. W ≈Çy≈ºwach tego brakuje. InteresujƒÖca za to jest niezwyk≈Ça dok≈Çadno≈õƒá w technice, kt√≥ra stanowi o sukcesie w tej dyscyplinie sportu. Wszystko musi zagraƒá idealnie. Jak w zegarku. I to jest fascynujƒÖce - t≈Çumaczy≈Ç. Kania urodzi≈Ç siƒô w Warszawie, ale mieszka w Konstancinie. Pierwsze kroki w sporcie stawia≈Ç w UKS Zryw S≈Çomczyn. Tam uczƒôszcza≈Ç do gimnazjum. Pod koniec nauki w nim zmieni≈Ç klub na Legiƒô Warszawa. W S≈Çomczynie jego pierwszƒÖ trenerkƒÖ by≈Ça Bo≈ºena Goss. Przez wiƒôkszƒÖ czƒô≈õƒá kariery trenowa≈Ç z Bartoszem Pisarkiem, kt√≥ry jest obecnie prezesem Polskiego ZwiƒÖzku Sport√≥w Wrotkarskich. W ostatnich latach swoje umiejƒôtno≈õci szkoli≈Ç we W≈Çoszech. Tam wraz z rodze≈Ñstwem, kt√≥re te≈º startuje w obu tych dyscyplinach sportu, spƒôdzi≈Ç rok. Trenowa≈Ç w√≥wczas z wielokrotnym mistrzem ≈õwiata na rolkach W≈Çochem Gregorym Duggento. - Po powrocie stamtƒÖd nagle zaczƒô≈Çy pojawiaƒá siƒô bardzo dobre wyniki zar√≥wno na rolkach, jak i w ≈Çy≈ºwiarstwie szybkim - m√≥wi≈Ç. Kania ma nadziejƒô, ≈ºe w to, co zrobi≈Ç w Inzell w przedsezonowych startach, to nie jest jego ostatnie s≈Çowo w tym sezonie. Celem jest bowiem start w zimowych igrzyskach olimpijskich w Pekinie. - Zrobiƒô wszystko, co w mojej mocy, ≈ºeby to osiƒÖgnƒÖƒá. To jest moje marzenie. Na pewno wyniki, jakie zaczƒÖ≈Çem osiƒÖgaƒá, dajƒÖ nadziejƒô - przyzna≈Ç. Postƒôp zrobi≈Ç rzeczywi≈õcie niesamowity. Rok temu ustanawia≈Ç rekord ≈ºyciowy w mistrzostwach Polski i wynosi≈Ç on 36,96 sek. Teraz ≈ºyci√≥wka to 35,34. Skok zatem jest gigantyczny i to po zaledwie kilku miesiƒÖcach treningu z kadrƒÖ narodowƒÖ. To jest ju≈º czas, kt√≥ry powinien daƒá mu olimpijskƒÖ kwalifikacjƒô. Kania jest studentem Politechniki Warszawskiej. Ma uko≈Ñczone dwa lata, ale ze wzglƒôdu na przygotowania do igrzysk wziƒÖ≈Ç urlop dzieka≈Ñski. Jest na kierunku Automatyka i Robotyka na Wydziale Mechanicznym Energetyki i Lotnictwa. Kiedy≈õ grywa≈Ç na gitarze, ale ostatnio jest fanem keyboardu. W wolnym czasie, kt√≥rego niestety nie ma zbyt wiele, uczy siƒô graƒá. To go relaksuje.

title: Damen F√ºrstenfeldbruck: √úberackers Siegesserie rei√üt im sechsten Spiel
creator: Dieter Metzler
description: Lediglich dem SC Gr√∂benzell gelingt bei den Damen im Landkreis F√ºrstenfeldbruck ein Sieg. Die Bzirsliga- und A-Klasse-Teams verlieren hingegen.
full_description: Lediglich dem SC Gr√∂benzell gelingt bei den Damen im Landkreis F√ºrstenfeldbruck ein Sieg. Die Bzirsliga- und A-Klasse-Teams verlieren hingegen. F√ºrstenfeldbruck‚Äì Einen schwarzen Samstag erlebten die drei Vertreter aus dem Brucker Landkreis, die in der Bezirksliga auf Torejagd gehen: Alle drei Mannschaften kehrten erfolglos von ihren Ausw√§rtsbegegnungen zur√ºck. ST Scheyern - FC Puchheim 5:2 (4:1) Der Ausfall von f√ºnf Stammkr√§ften war nicht zu kompensieren, berichtet FCPTrainer Sascha Widemann. ‚ÄûIn normaler Besetzung h√§tten wir wohl kaum Probleme bekommen.‚Äú Neben drei verletzten und zwei, die noch arbeiten mussten, gesellte sich auch noch eine kranke Spielerin. Bereits nach einer guten Viertelstunde lief der FCP einem 0:4-R√ºckstand hinterher. Nach einer Notbremse und dem daraus resultierenden Platzverweis sowie einen von Verena Huber verwandelten Elfmeter zum 4:1 haben sich die FCP-Frauen zwar leichter getan, aber mehr als ein zweiter Treffer, erneut durch Huber, war nicht mehr drin. FC Wacker M√ºnchen II - SC Unterpfaffenhofen 5:0 (3:0) Von Duseltoren spricht SCUTrainer Volkmar Zborowski nach der siebten Saisonpleite des Aufsteigers. Es klingt zwar bei dem Ergebnis seltsam, aber der SCU-Trainer meint, seine Elf h√§tte durchaus ein Unentschieden verdient. Dass es einmal mehr nicht klappte, sei auch dem Umstand zuzuschreiben, dass die Upfer Madl an jedem Spieltag notgedrungen mit einer anderen Aufstellung antreten. ‚ÄûWir ziehen die Saison durch, dann sehen wir weiter‚Äú, gibt sich Zborowski k√§mpferisch. FC Oberau - RW √úberacker 4:2 (2:1) Es fing eigentlich optimal an f√ºr die Rot-Wei√üen aus √úberacker. ‚ÄûWir sind mit dem bisher sch√∂nsten Saisontor durch Anna Richter in F√ºhrung gegangen‚Äú, berichtet Trainer Andreas Fasching. Nach zwei gravierenden Fehlern drehten die Gastgeberinnen aber den Spie√ü um. Nach der Pause gelang √úberacker in einer zehnmin√ºtigen Druckphase durch Johanna Draude der 2:2-Ausgleich. Postwendend allerdings kassierte RW den 2:3- R√ºckstand und wenig sp√§ter nach einem Lattenabpraller noch das 2:4. ‚ÄûIn der Summe geht der Sieg f√ºr Oberau in Ordnung, weil wir uns mehrFehler leisteten‚Äú, muss Fasching feststellen. SC Gr√∂benzell - SV Haunshofen 1:0 (0:0) Trotz erheblicher Aufstellungssorgen, die Trainer Stephan Franke einmal mehr besch√§ftigten, gelang seinen SCG-Frauen der zweite Saisonsieg. Nachdem die Begegnung lange ausgeglichen war, kr√∂nte Elena Vogg einen Alleingang mit dem alles entscheidenden Treffer (20.). In der zweiten Halbzeit h√§tten die Gr√∂benzellerinnen durchaus noch ein, zwei Treffer drauflegen k√∂nnen. Die Chancen dazu hatten sie, doch sie blieben allesamt ungenutzt. SV Prittriching - SG Aich/ Aufkirchen 5:0 (4:0) Immer noch auf das erste Erfolgserlebnis wartet die von Georg Sigl trainierte Spielgemeinschaft aus Aich/Aufkirchen. Auch im vierten Anlauf wurde es nichts mit dem ersehnten Sieg. ‚ÄûIn der ersten Halbzeit haben wir alle Tugenden vergessen‚Äú, berichtete Sigl. ‚ÄûZu weit weg vom Gegner, kein Zweikampfverhalten, fehlende Laufbereitschaft‚Äú, musste der √úbungsleiter bei seinen M√§dels feststellen. Und so war die Entscheidung schnell gefallen. Bereits nach 25 Minuten liefen die G√§ste einem 0:4-R√ºckstand hinterher. (Dieter Metzler)

title: Openjobmetis Varese, le dimissioni di Conti sono irrevocabili
creator: Alessandro Maggi
description: Bulgheroni, Valentino e Castelli hanno cercato di convincere il dirigente a tornare sulla sua scelta
full_description: Le dimissioni di Andrea Conti, in casa Openjobmetis Varese, sono irrevocabili secondo la Prealpina. Nella serata di domenica Toto Bulgheroni, Thomas Valentino e Alberto Castelli avrebbero cercato di far recedere il dirigente dalla sua decisione. Invano.

title: Boeren protesteren tegen onteigening: 'Straks blijft er geen boer meer over'
description: Boeren protesteren dinsdag tegen de onteigening van een aantal boerenbedrijven in de gemeente Krimpenwaard. De gemeente en de provincie Zuid-Holland willen de boeren weg hebben zodat er plek komt voor een nieuw natuurgebied. Met een deel van de boeren is al een overeenstemming bereikt, maar met een aantal andere boeren niet. 'Het gaat nu echt met de botte bijl, daar wordt niemand gelukkig van', zegt initiatiefnemer Floor de Jong. De boeren staan met hun trekkers en spandoeken op de rotondes in de gemeente.

title: Anthony Hamilton zu Lewis und Max: ¬´Das ist unwahr¬ª
description: Anthony Hamilton, der Vater des siebenfachen Formel-1-Champions Lewis Hamilton, spricht √ºber die angebliche Rivalit√§t zwischen seinem Sohn und WM-Leader Max Verstappen (Red Bull Racing).
full_description: Seit Beginn der GP-Saison 2021 sind Max Verstappen (Red Bull Racing) und Lewis Hamilton (Mercedes-Benz) in einen spannenden Titelkampf verwickelt. Klar gab es dabei auch das eine oder andere b√∂se Wort, besonders nach der Kollision der beiden Ausnahmek√∂nner in Silverstone ‚Äì als Max im Spital landete und Lewis den Sieg holte. Aber ist das wirklich diese erbitterte Rivalit√§t in der Art von Ayton Senna und Alain Prost? Ist das sogar ein Hassduell, wie es von einigen Publikationen beschrieben worden ist? Anthony Hamilton, Vater des siebenfachen Formel-1-Weltmeisters, ist nicht dieser Ansicht. Er sagt gegen√ºber dem Portal talkSPORT: ¬´Nein, das ist nicht wahr. Sie sind beide leidenschaftliche Wettbewerber, und Max ist dort, wo Lewis sein will. Im Grunde sind sie wie zwei Boxer, die f√ºr einen grossen Kampf in den Ring gestiegen sind. Aber ich bin sicher, wenn alles vorbei ist, dann werden sie sich umarmen und sich auf die Schultern klopfen.¬ª Moment mal, und wie war das im Training zum USA-GP auf dem Circuit of the Americas, als es zu einem kurzen Duell kam und Max nachher seinen Gegner als ¬´dummen Idioten¬ª bezeichnete? Anthony Hamilton: ¬´Ach, das ist doch alles Wettkampf. Wenn du gegen√ºber deinem Gegner zu freundlich gesinnt bist, dann gehst du automatisch ein wenig vom Gas.¬ª ¬´Sehen wir uns an, was sich weiter hinten im Feld abgespielt hat, mit diesem Duell der Ferrari- und der McLaren-Fahrer. Und diese Jungs sind miteinander befreundet. Norris und Sainz sind seit ihrer gemeinsamen Zeit Kumpels, und mit Ricciardo kommt ohnehin jeder gut aus. Aber auf der Rennstrecke ist sich jeder der n√§chste. Das ist halt Racing ‚Äì abseits der Strecke ist Raum f√ºr Freundschaft, aber auf der Piste gilt: In der Liebe und im Krieg ist alles erlaubt.¬ª Lewis Hamilton hat sich f√ºr weitere zwei Jahre bei Mercedes verpflichtet, f√ºr 2022 und 2023. Was passiert danach? Anthony Hamilton: ¬´Ich bin nicht sicher, wie lange Lewis noch fahren m√∂chte. Ich sage immer zu ihm ‚Äì so lange du dich fit f√ºhlst, so lange du dich jedes Mal auf deinen Rennwagen freust und Spass am Rennfahren hast, so lange solltest du tun, was du am liebsten machst. Und letztlich wird es wohl darauf hinauslaufen.¬ª Aber das alles nicht nichts mit dem WM-Ausgang 2021 zu tun haben. Hamilton senior: ¬´Die beiden werden das bis zuletzt unter sich ausmachen, und es wird immer eine fantastische Saison bleiben, ungeachtet dessen, wer am Ende die Nase vorn hatte.¬ª ¬´Lewis ist sozusagen der letzte Mohikaner, seine Generation mit Rosberg, Kubica und Kovalainen ist weg, nur er ist noch da. Er wird im kommenden Januar 37 Jahre alt, aber er kann es noch immer mit allen im Feld aufnehmen, als w√§re er zehn Jahre j√ºnger.¬ª 01. title: ‚ÄòExtraordinary‚Äô: Unknown 16yo‚Äôs cricket miracle
description: The Brazilian national women‚Äôs side has claimed a miraculous one-run win over Canada in the ICC Women‚Äòs T20 World Cup Americas Region Qualifiers, taking five wickets in five consecutive deliveries to steal victory from the jaws of defeat.
full_description: The Brazilian national women‚Äôs side has claimed a miraculous one-run win over Canada in the ICC Women‚Äòs T20 World Cup Americas Region Qualifiers, taking five wickets in five consecutive deliveries to steal victory from the jaws of defeat. After winning the toss and electing to field at Mexico‚Äôs Reforma Athletic Club on Monday, Canada restricted the Brazilians to just 48/7 from their 17 overs in the rain-affected contest. Catch all the ICC T20 World Cup action live & exclusive to Fox Cricket, available on Kayo. New to Kayo? Start your free trial today. But the Canadians didn‚Äôt find batting much easier in response, crawling their way towards 46/5 with six balls remaining. Regardless, Canada needed just three runs from the final over with five wickets in hand, a scenario in which the batting side would win 99 per cent of the time. Brazilian teenager Laura Cardoso was tasked with bowling the final over, and the 16-year-old seamer started with a dot ball. For the second delivery, Canada‚Äôs Krima Kapadia was run out after attempting a quick single, giving the Brazilians a glimmer of hope. Cardoso then rattled the Canadian camp by claiming a hat-trick with her next three deliveries, becoming the first Brazilian to achieve the feat in T20 internationals. She removed Hala Azmat, Hiba Shamshad and Sana Zafar in consecutive deliveries, sending them back to the pavilion for a golden duck. Suddenly the equation was three runs required from the last ball, with Canada‚Äôs highest run-scorer Mukhwinder Gill on strike. Gill managed to find the gap and desperately scampered between the wickets, looking for a double. But the 33-year-old was run out while attempting the second run, meaning Brazil had secured a miraculous one-run win. . @brasil_cricket pull off one of the most extraordinary wins I've ever seen, right up there with Nepal's Miracle at Windhoek. Canada need 3 to win off final over with 5 wickets in hand. Dot, runout, then hat-trick by Laura Cardoso. 1 + runout off final ball. Brazil win by 1 run. LAURA CARDOSO. Remember the name! Incredible finish for @brasil_cricket women in Mexico City. Canada needed three off the final over but 16-year-old Cardoso takes a hat-trick bookended by two run outs to give Brazil a win by one run. DOT WWWWW √∞¬ü¬á¬ß√∞¬ü¬á¬∑√∞¬ü¬è¬è What an electrifying way to close this tournament for us! #T20WorldCup #HatTrick pic.twitter.com/skPrLuYOT8 According to cricket statistician Kausthub Gudipati, Brazil had become the first team to take five wickets in five balls in international cricket. Brazil coach Liam Cook tweeted: ‚ÄúI couldn‚Äôt be more proud of this group of players. They‚Äôve given everything in this tournament. The hard work they have put in over the last 18 months paid off today ‚Ä¶ This is just the beginning!‚Äù Brazil captain Roberta Moretti Avery posted: ‚ÄúWould I say I was expecting for a run out WWW run out for the last over to defend 2 to beat Canada today? No, I wasn‚Äôt. But what a feeling!‚Äù The USA women‚Äôs national team finished top of the ladder in the Americas Qualifier with five wins, and will subsequently advance to the ICC Women‚Äôs T20 World Cup Global Qualifier in 2022. A major announcement this week made the Ashes even more exciting and it was one Steve Smith admitting he was ‚Äòglad‚Äô to see it happen. A former Irish international has made WBBL history with a stunning solo effort in the grand final rematch. Dean Jones‚Äô secret love child, via his mother, is suing the late Australian cricket legend‚Äôs widow for a piece of his estate.

title: T20 World Cup: India-Pakistan ‚Äòsporting brotherhood‚Äô impresses coach Hayden
creator: AP
description: Matthew Hayden has been impressed by the ‚Äúsporting brotherhood‚Äù on display after Pakistan beat India in Sharjah at the T20 World Cup.

Incentivi auto elettriche, bisogna sbrigarsi: ecco come ottenere il bonus
description: Dalle ore 10 di domani, mercoled√¨ 27 ottobre sar√† possibile prenotare sulla piattaforma ecobonus.mise.gov.it gli¬†incentivi per l'acquisto di veicoli a basse emissioni, dopo che √® stato pubblicato in Gazzetta ufficiale il Decreto fiscale che ha rifinanziato per il 2021 il fondo automotive con ulteriori 100 milioni di euro. Il tempo stringe:¬†in occasione del precedente rifinanziamento del cosiddetto fondo Ecobonus,¬†i 57 milioni di euro messi a disposizione dal governo terminarono in appena tre giorni anche a causa dell'inserimento dei moltissimi ordini raccolti nei giorni precedenti. Lo stesso potrebbe accadere in questa occasione.¬† Le nuove¬†risorse - spiega il Mise - vengono ripartite su quattro linee. La prima: 65 milioni per acquistare i veicoli con emissioni comprese tra 0-60 g/km CO2. Il contributo √® riconosciuto anche per gli acquisti in leasing e si differenzia a seconda della fascia di emissioni (0-20 o 21-60) e per la presenza di un veicolo da rottamare. In particolare, per i veicoli elettrici con emissioni comprese tra 0-20 g/km √® riconosciuto un contributo fino 6.000 euro con rottamazione e 4.000 senza rottamazione, mentre per i veicoli ibridi con emissioni comprese tra 21-60 g/km √® riconosciuto un contributo fino a 2.500 euro con rottamazione e 1.500 euro senza rottamazione. La seconda: 20 milioni per l'acquisto di veicoli commerciali e speciali, di cui 15 milioni esclusivamente per i veicoli elettrici. Il contributo √® riconosciuto fino a un massimo di 8.000 euro e si differenzia in base alla ‚ÄúMassa Totale a Terra - MTT‚Äù e all'alimentazione. La terza: 10 milioni per acquistare, esclusivamente con rottamazione, i veicoli con emissioni comprese tra 61-135 g/km CO2. √à riconosciuto un contributo di 1.500 euro. La quarta: 5 milioni per l'acquisto di veicoli di categoria M1 usati, di classe Euro non inferiore a 6 ed emissioni fino a 160 g/km di CO2. √à riconosciuto un contributo fino 2.000 euro, calcolato in base alla fascia di emissione. Per usufruire del contributo √® necessario rottamare una vettura immatricolata prima del gennaio 2011, o che abbia raggiunto i dieci anni nel periodo in cui viene richiesto l'ecobonus.

title: The #OleOut Mailbox‚Ä¶
creator: Editor F365
description: The tide has well and truly ‚Ä¶ The post The #OleOut Mailbox‚Ä¶ appeared first on Football365.
content: Keep your mails on Solskjaer or anything else coming to theeditor@football365.com. ¬† Five #OleIns I really should have sent this on Friday, it‚Äôs hard to send it after Man U just lost by 5 at home. Anyway, here are the reasons I think Ole keeps his job. 1. Who hired him? The man who hired Ole and extended his contract is also responsible for 3 other failures. 2 of the 3 we‚Äôre big time managers and still failed. I believe 4 consecutive failures is a mark of incompetence. Nobody wants to be called incompetent, this Ole keeps his job, because no rich man (Woodward) wants to look at a mirror and call it correct. I‚Äôm shit at this. Each club has expectations, Man U it‚Äôs silverware, Leeds, stay in the premier league, win a cup, Europa, the fact that Man U have been shite since he took over, it‚Äôs time to move on Woodward. 2. Club legend. Man U have 3 European titles, one being the famous treble, which Ole helped secure. Even if you want him gone, that Man won that club it‚Äôs biggest shouting point to this day. There is nobody shouting about the play style, nobody says Man U changed the game, but that treble though, it somehow keeps Giggs and Ole on a job. 3. Friends in the media. They seem keen to avoid criticizing the man. You would have to watch ESPN , to see anyone notice that Man U lost by 5 to Liverpool. Otherwise,it‚Äôs Paul Pogba‚Äôs fault, Luke Shaw, Ronaldo, or Maguire‚Äôs fault. In my opinion, elite Leve players. What about the management and coaching, does that never apply. According to the loudest mouth Gary Neville, never look past the players. The coaching is working it the players fault. 4. Broadcasting. Why is it Man U are always available. I watch an Everton game 2 times in a month. Even Liverpool, despite being better don‚Äôt appear on tv as much as Man U. Can someone on tv say to Man U, they need to improve their product and until then , limited tv time. 5. Fans. It‚Äôs hard to accuse Man U fans, I mean that‚Äôs the only fanbase that demonstatively acted against the super 12 league. How can they react like that in 1 week, but not react at all for 2-3 years? All in all, Ole shouldn‚Äôt be fired, because the guy doing the hiring hasn‚Äôt changed. His latest hire was worse than his previous 3, so it‚Äôs actually getting worse. Even Moyes won some silverware. I feel like we‚Äôll be here 3 years from now, new manager, who doesn‚Äôt fit the club, isn‚Äôt backed when it matters, Woodward then buys Mbappe and puts his manager on the crosshairs. Dave(Groundhogs day, all over again), Somewhere F365 says: Gary Neville on Ole is a logical endpoint for football‚Äôs chumocracy Predictable sadness Well, that was so predictable, I‚Äôm annoyed at myself for not putting a bet on. I told my wife the starting line-up in the morning, that is how predictable it is. We all knew it was going to be a battering, it‚Äôs sad. Not sad in an upsetting way, just sad in the other way that I can‚Äôt describe. Ole chased this young lad in Germany for about 18 months, finally signing him only to realise that he has no idea of what to do with him. Ole signed a couple of young wingers, only to realise he has no idea of what to do with them. Ole signed this guy from Holland, an apparent creative, lively character, only to realise he has no idea of what to do with him. Ole signed a guy who had a few ok games for Palace and made him first choice, undroppable right back. Not realising and still not realising that he isn‚Äôt that good. Ole signed the most expensive defender in the world, failing to realise that he has a terrible CV for a reason and then made him captain. Ole signed Verane who has won everything and has made him look just as incompetent. Ole said when he first came in that the team would outrun the opposition and they now sit bottom of the running stats. Ole plays Fred and McTominay as 2 CDM when neither of them have been good enough from day one. Ole plays 2 CDM and says he is an attacking team with the Utd DNA. Ole has made Ronaldo look distinctively rubbish. Ole has not developed any player, either ones already there or ones he has bought. In fact, every player has regressed. Ole still sees a player in Pogba and we are just awaiting him being unleashed. Ole seems happy with Fernandes giving the ball away 95% of the time because he will eventually get one right. Ole has spent close to 500million quid and made the team worse. Ole‚Äôs cliches are a book in itself, awaiting the world‚Äôs most boring, predictable autobiograpghy. Ole‚Äôs mates still won‚Äôt say it how it is, despite being paid to be impartial. (scholes ex) Ole has been in charge of the worst period at Utd for over 30 years despite spending almost as much as his 3 predessors combined. Ole says his coaching staff are brilliant. Ole gave new contracts to Jones, Mata, Martial and probably a few others. He made De Gea the highest paid keeper in the world. Ole says he‚Äôs come too far and he is so close to achieving what he set out to do. Which is what exactly? Please tell us. Ole says winning trophies is not everything. I thought that was the whole point. Ole doesn‚Äôt park in his own space. Becasue he doesn‚Äôt have a wheel. Ole has no style of play, never has had, it‚Äôs a myth. Ole promotes youth, another myth. Name one? Ole yet again holds his hand up and says he made a mistake. After every game. Even though I feel the players are not anyway near as good as they are made out to be, that is Ole‚Äôs team, that is what he has put together in almost 3 years. I wouldn‚Äôt say that any player is safe when a decent, professional manager who knows what he is doing comes in. We cannot defend even the most basic of attacks, we have no midfield, we create nothing, we have no style, no fight, no grit, no determination, no flair. But Ole needs time? He‚Äôs had 3 years and we are no better than we were when he took over, I‚Äôd even say we are worse, no, we definatley are worse than we ever were under LVG and Maur. This result has been coming all season, with the exception of Leeds and Newcastle, we could have easily been beaten in every game. Quick note on Pogba being sent off, (stupid hair style for a grown ass man) yes it was a bad foul, yes it was very dangerous, reckless, ill-disciplined, stupid, naive, reckless. Not disputing the sending off. But can we just point out that it was yet another hospital ball from the messiah Fernandes. That sort of challenge has been waiting to happen for months. Terrible pass that was only going to end up one way. Why on earth they decided to give Ole a new contract in the summer is beyond me. Nobody was ever going to come along and tap him up, he was never going to turn any offer down. They could and should have waited until December, but decided to make him something like the 3rd highest paid manager in the league, which is now going to cost them millions when they eventually fire him. But we finsihed 2nd last season. So did Maurinho and you wanted him gone, plus, he actually won something. Mike (Just give him more time and few more 100 million, we might keep a clean sheet) United confusion United supporters, and indeed the club itself, are a very confused bunch. We‚Äôre so desperate to recreate the success and longevity of the Busby and Ferguson eras that we‚Äôre ignoring the real history of this club. For every Busby there have been multiple Frank O‚ÄôFarrells and Wilf McGuiness‚Äô. Without being realistic about Dave Sexton and Ron Atkinson there would never have been a Ferguson era. Evolution has to be honest; make the best decisions you can and then assess in an honest manner whether they worked or not. No trophies are handed out for who‚Äôs had the longest manager. For years we loved taking the piss out of Chelsea, and later City, for their attitudes towards binning managers ‚Äì because let‚Äôs face it, we could ‚Äì but in our desire to be different we‚Äôve lost sight of what‚Äôs most important, that circumstances dictate the decisions, not the other way around. The policy of treating our managers with respect and giving them resources and time is a good one, but the knowledge that we aren‚Äôt the sort of club who sacks title winning managers (or doubles in Ancelotti‚Äôs) case after one poor run or next shiny bauble in the background has to be enough. No club is best served pursuing the wrong course too long. Chris, MUFC. Fixtures forcing United action I genuinely believe that if Man Utd had a gentler run of fixtures to come after the game yesterday, there would still be plenty of support internally to let the Ole show run on and on and give him even more time to turn it around despite all the damning evidence against it. There are many who seem to think we‚Äôre in our ‚Äòta ra Fergie, 3 years of excuses and it‚Äôs still crap‚Äô moment, and it‚Äôs all about to magically come good and become *something*. What exactly? Who can tell! It‚Äôs only because the upcoming fixtures are so unappealing that their hands will be forced, whether it‚Äôs in the next day or so, or after Spurs, Man City or Chelsea. Ole can have no complaints, 3 years and the vast funds made available to him has given him far more patience to succeed than any other manager at a top level club would have enjoyed. This should have been the season Liverpool had after signing Alisson and VVD ‚Äì it is not. And this is really the problem ‚Äì it‚Äôs all knee jerk from the Man Utd hierarchy, floating from day to day trying to cobble something together. What will really be different in another week or another month? Bayern are really the super club Man Utd *should* have become. When they played in the 99‚Ä≤ final, they felt like similar clubs with similar histories and identities. Since then they have developed a culture based on their rich heritage and a ruthless desire to succeed, which has become bigger than any one person ‚Äì there is no SAF. Ex players are in significant positions at the club, but it‚Äôs all in the pursuit of building a relentless winning machine. It feels like Man Utd had aspirations of adopting that kind of model; I think that was the vision when this cycle started. It‚Äôs just been horribly, horribly executed. Bleak! Alex, Ipswich What are United ‚Äúclose‚Äù to? When asked if OGS was willing to resign his response was ‚ÄòWe are too close to give up now‚Äô. I was a bit confused by this following this season‚Äôs showing so decided to look it up in the old Oxford English‚Ä¶it states close means ‚Äòvery near to someone or something; with very little space between‚Äô. Firstly, I was surprised, that as we are 8 points behind league leaders Chelsea after only 9 games, I am unsure if that qualifies as ‚Äòclose‚Äô, at least from a quantitative standpoint. Given what I also experienced last night being ‚Äòutter dogsh#t‚Äô, and in fact worse than ANY football being played under his predecessors, I‚Äôm also unsure we can be considered ‚Äòclose‚Äô on a qualitative level also. The question then becomes ‚Äòwhat the F‚Ä¶‚Äô does Ole actually think we are close to, and does he expect another half billion to eke out that SMALL gap to City, Liverpool and Chelsea? #neverolein Dubai Red ¬† Where are the tactics? If there is one team in the EPL that consistently plays the same way, regardless of who comes into the team that day, over the 3 years OGS has been in charge of United, it‚Äôs Liverpool. City occasionally change things up ‚Äì Cancelo pushing into midfield last season or false 9‚Äôs when Aguero was out injured. Chelsea have been through a couple of managers, etc. But Liverpool play exactly the same way. So how can OGS and his coaching team set up and play so badly. Scholes saw how bad they were against Atalanta and prophesied exactly what was going to happen. It was that clear. So for Neville to continue defending the manager and coaching team to the hilt, was extraordinary. OGS had set them up with a 2 man midfield and they were going to press (if you can call it that) when they clearly hadn‚Äôt been coached how to do it properly or the players couldn‚Äôt be arsed to do it properly. I just can‚Äôt imagine they were doing this brilliantly in training and then failed on Sunday. But against Liverpool? Neville using the ‚ÄúUnited came second ahead of Liverpool and Chelsea last year‚Äù to defend his pal OGS is insane. It is clear that Fernandes has been the single positive impact since joining. And playing counter attacking football leveraging several fast forwards. Since bringing in Ronaldo they have changed the playing philosophy. Fernandes doesn‚Äôt have the same influence or impact (just as when he plays for Portugal), they have one less fast forward, Ronaldo shuffles around preserving energy waiting for an opportunity in the box. He is an amazing header of the ball but it is unsurprising he scores a higher percentage than on the ground now, as it means he doesn‚Äôt have to chase and run hard to get into position. He doesn‚Äôt bring other players into the game like Cavani either ‚Äì who would have been better to start yesterday. But the point the question is who is the most deluded? Neville or OGS. OGS saying the project Is close to coming together or Neville saying OGS is a good manager with a great snd experienced coaching team? How much does OGS think it‚Äôs going okay because of support from people like Neville snd Ferdinand? United have become the archetypical vanity project. Expensive players who think they are so good they only have to turn up to win. With teams playing to a system and with players who are willing to put in the graft to go with it, United are being left behind. How much further down will they go using the same tactics against more astute managers than OGS ( or Neville.) Paul McDevitt ¬† Formation change Man utd have been awful for the past games and watching them against Liverpool was heartbreaking.As a fan, I don‚Äôt understand the coach‚Äôs obsession with a 4-2-3-1 formation. I think solskjaer should change to 5-3-2 formation. Play Wanbisaka at the right of the defensive 3; Shaw and Dalot as wing backs; any 2 in the midfield with Bruno Fernandez/Sancho/Lingardinhio slightly ahead; Ronaldo and any of Rashford/Cavani/Greenwood up top. This would make us more compact and solid at the back and dangerous in the attack. It would also suit the counterattacking style of play he loves to play. I think Conte, if given the opportunity, would utilize this same system. Joel Z. ¬† Time to say goodbye Been very much #OleIn all along and been trying to cling to signs of growth but the last few games have shown he has done his job and has taken them as far as he can. Time to say thanks and goodbye as this result has been on the cards for a while. Whilst they would still have been miles off the signing of Ronaldo was always going to cause issues in some way or another and I‚Äôm sure it wont be long before the media leaks start. However, to my point, I heard someone make a very good point over the weekend about when he goes (it‚Äôs When not if now). He won‚Äôt resign due to being stubborn/proud (delete as applicable) so it will need the trigger being pulled. Woodward is due to leave at the end of the year and there is no way he will be the guy ‚Äòwho shot Bambi‚Äô So, he is here till January when the job will fall to Richard Arnold‚Ä¶and we all know he hasn‚Äôt been the same since GMTV (one for the morning TV crowd) Right back in to exile King Ralph (stayed till the end to avoid the Traffic) ¬† No need to gloat‚Ä¶ So I‚Äôm a Liverpool fan but I‚Äôm not here to gloat. No need. We were and are a superior TEAM. Have your expensive toys. They just go to waste on the bench anyway. Just to prove how Ole is out of his depth is the fact he took off your best player in the 1St half, Greenwood, and left on that Oldie Wan Kenobi ‚ÄòRonaldo‚Äô who was the icing on that pile of shite. I‚Äôve watched many comedies in my life. Only Fools and Horses, Arrested Development, Always Sunny in Philadelphia, Allo Allo. So many classics. But yesterday during United Liverpool someone should have told me they‚Äôd interrupt the program to show Benny Hill on the tear. Don‚Äôt get me wrong, it was HILARIOUS! Who you ask? The most expensive CB in world is who! Harry ‚ÄòBenny Hill‚Äô Maguire. I mean he‚Äôs so bad it‚Äôs actually hilarious. I thought Djimi Traore was funny but Maguire has clearly said I said your shite defending son and raise you utter shite. Watch him for each first half goal. For the 1st, forget about it. Just standing like a tree in the middle of nowhere. For the second he actually tackles and pushes his own man. Brilliant. The 4th he‚Äôs busy trying to tackle Firmino but it‚Äôs a 10 year old kid kinda tackle. Just swinging at the ball he can‚Äôt reach I love him. He cost more than Virgil. Beautiful. Any United fan that criticises City‚Äôs spending, well you really can‚Äôt talk. Btw Varane was never gonna be your rock. I‚Äôm also a Madrid supporter. He has been pants for years now. Benny Hill finally has his comedic partner. Alex (New York) ¬† Goal-poaching managers This might be true, it might not, but hey, everyone loves a theory, so here goes ‚Äì if there is one position on a football pitch that cannot, repeat cannot, ever go on to have a successful managerial career, it‚Äôs ‚Äògoal-poacher‚Äô. What is a goal poacher? Someone who reads the evolving currents of the game, notices its aura, how these two players are slotting together, how the midfield pivot is somehow off balance? It most certainly is not. It‚Äôs a player who, at a speed that would warp the mind of us non-pros, can spot that the weight their defender is shifted slightly the wrong way and so if they bend their run right this second . . goal. Goal for Van Nistelrooy, goal for Owen, Vardy. Goal for Solskjaer. Do you reckon that, if that was how they ‚Äòsaw‚Äô football, all their instincts tuned that way over twenty years or so ‚Äì they‚Äôd suddenly start to develop a deep, broader appreciation for it afterward? Or might they think things like ‚Äì Ronaldo, Greenwood, Rashford, Sancho, altogether? That‚Äôs four times as many goals! They‚Äôll figure out how with their own natural abilities! To be as frank as it requires ‚Äì Solskjaer being mentally fit to be an elite manager is like saying Michael Owen is mentally fit to be an elite analyst. It has always been thus ‚Äì the winning spell at the start was the demob-happy vibe of a team freed from Mourinho‚Äôs hateful reign; they played off that memory for a while. Now they‚Äôve forgotten. P.S Theory 2: until the cameras stop knee-jerk looking for Fergie at every game United will stay ‚Äòlike this‚Äô. best, Toby Sprigings ¬† Firmino resurgence Just a quick one on Firmino, what a resurgence over the last few weeks?! Last season was tricky to say the least (though his stats remained fairly consistent with previous years it just didn‚Äôt quite fire for him), and for a myriad of reasons, it was starting to look like his days as a first choice might be behind him. Given our absent defence/midfield, our pressing game was off, and we weren‚Äôt winning the ball back high up the pitch, which is where he flourishes. This season, with order restored to the rest of the team he looks sharp, he‚Äôs full of ideas, he‚Äôs confident and boy is it showing. Where I thought it would be Mane, Salah, Jota every week ‚Äì we currently have a real choice in there with Jota‚Äôs ability to play wide or in the middle. More than anything it will help manage fatigue and ensure Firmino and Jota have good minutes under their belts before AFCON. Lovely to see him back to his best. Just thought it was worth a mention. Cheers, Marc (London) ¬† The post The #OleOut Mailbox‚Ä¶ appeared first on Football365.
