Warum SBK-Rookie Axel Bassani (Ducati) so stark ist
description: In der Superbike-WM 2021 ist Axel Bassani die gr√∂√üte √úberraschung. Der Rookie steigerte sich kontinuierlich und f√§hrt seit seinem ersten Podium in Barcelona regelm√§√üig in den Top-5.
full_description: Kaum jemand h√§tte auf Axel Bassani als den Shooting-Star der Superbike-WM 2021 gewettet. Andrea Locatelli steht zwar in der Gesamtwertung vor Bassani, doch als Supersport-Weltmeister im Yamaha-Werksteam konnte man das auch erwarten. Als 17. der Supersport-WM 2020 dockte Bassani als j√ºngster Stammfahrer bei Motocorsa Ducati an. Vom ersten Rennen an war der Italiener ein regelm√§√üiger Top-15-Kandidat, in Misano fuhr er in allen Rennen in die Top-7. In Most folgte das erste Top-5-Ergebnis und in Barcelona das erste Podest. Zuletzt in San Juan war der Ducati-Pilot hinter den Superbike-Stars Razgatlioglu, Redding und Rea der st√§rkste Pilot. Bassani bleibt bodenst√§ndig. ¬´Jeder Fahrer h√§lt sich f√ºr den gr√∂√üten Fahrer aller Zeiten. Die Wahrheit ist aber, dass es viele Puzzleteile an der richtigen Stelle ben√∂tigt, um das erreichen, was man m√∂chte. Und das zu schaffen ist extrem schwer¬ª, sagte der Motocorsa-Pilot. ¬´Ich wechselte von der italienischen Supersport-Serie in die 600er Weltmeisterschaft. Dieser Wechsel fiel mir schwer, obwohl mein Team viel Erfahrung in dieser Kategorie hatte. Ich gab mein Bestes, aber ich war dort nicht richtig aufgehoben. Dann kam Lorenzo auf mich zu und daf√ºr, dass er mir die Chance gegeben hat, bin ich ihm sehr dankbar.¬ª Mit 199 Punkten ist Bassani WM-Neunter und liegt nur 14 Punkte hinter Kawasaki-Werkspilot Alex Lowes sowie GRT Yamaha-Ass Garrett Gerloff, der ein Werksmotorrad f√§hrt. ¬´Ich f√ºhle mich gro√üartig mit dem Team, den Jungs in meiner Box und mit der Ducati¬ª, verriet Bassani im Gespr√§ch mit SPEEDWEEK.com sein Erfolgsgeheimnis. ¬´Solche Ergebnisse wie jetzt habe ich nicht erwartet ‚Äì ich tr√§umte von Positionen um Platz 15. Nach dem ersten Test √§nderte sich das schon ein wenig, weil das Gef√ºhl mit dem Bike passte und das Team gut arbeitete. Mit jedem Rennen machten wir Fortschritte und warum nicht noch bessere Ergebnisse anpeilen? Wir versuchen jetzt, konstant in den Top-7 oder Top-6 zu fahren. Am Bike gibt es ein paar wenige Dinge zu verbessern, aber das Potenzial f√ºr starke Ergebnisse ist vorhanden.¬ª Motocorsa-Boss Lorenzo Mauri best√§tigte in San Juan gegen√ºber SPEEDWEEK.com, dass er mit dem 22-J√§hrigen in der kommenden Saison weitermachen will. Schriftlich fixiert ist aber noch nichts. ¬´Im Moment konzentriere ich mich noch auf die letzten Saisonrennen, danach werde ich mit meinem Teamchef √ºber die kommende Saison sprechen¬ª, sagte Bassani. ¬´Unser Verh√§ltnis ist super und ich m√∂chte im Team bleiben. Es ist mein erstes Jahr in der Superbike-WM und wir haben gute Resultate erreicht. Um jedem Rennen in den Top-7 zu landen, fehlt uns aber noch die Erfahrung. Mit jedem Rennen verstehen wir unsere M√∂glichkeiten besser. Wir steigern uns gemeinsam.¬ª

title: Hardik Pandya's Shoulder Injury "Not Serious": Report
description: Hardik Pandya's shoulder injury sustained during the T20 World Cup opener against Pakistan is believed to be a minor one and he is likely to be available for the next game against New Zealand on...
full_description: Flamboyant India all-rounder Hardik Pandya's shoulder injury sustained during the T20 World Cup opener against Pakistan is believed to be a minor one and he is likely to be available for the next game against New Zealand on October 31. Pandya, who did not bowl in the IPL last month, is playing only as a batter right now and scored 11 off 8 balls on Sunday night, looking distinctly uncomfortable against pacers before being hit on the shoulder by a short ball. "Yes, Hardik's scan reports have come and the injury is not very serious. Also the fact that there is a six-day gap between two games gives him enough time to recuperate," a senior BCCI official told PTI on conditions of anonymity. "But obviously, the medical team would wait and watch as to how he shapes up during the training sessions," he added. Pandya had recently said that he would be bowling during the knock-out stages but India's chances hinge on the New Zealand game. Losing the match would seriously jeopardise their prospects of going ahead in the tournament. The games against Scotland, Namibia and Afghanistan are expected to be easy wins for India, Pakistan and New Zealand. Therefore, if India lose to New Zealand, it will hamper their chances of making it to the top two in the group. In this scenario, Pandya's fitness issues have seriously affected India's balance. Promoted In fact, there are questions being raised about chairman of selectors Chetan Sharma assertions that Pandya will be bowling in the IPL to gear up for the World Cup. He didn't bowl an over and the communication on Pandya's fitness status between the team management and selectors seems baffling at this time. There have been conflicting reports about when he would start bowling. Before the Pakistan game, the player said that he would perhaps bowl in the knock-outs but the statement did not look convincing.

title: Udinese: al via campagna abbonamenti per 13 partite
description: Sottoscrizioni da oggi per rimanenti gare alla Dacia Arena
full_description: (ANSA) - UDINE, 26 OTT - Udinese Calcio ha lanciato la campagna abbonamenti 2021/2022 all'insegna del motto "Il mio posto √® qui". La sottoscrizione prende il via questa mattina alle 10.30 con una prima fase di prelazione dedicata agli abbonati della stagione 2019/2020 che, come recita lo slogan, potranno riprendersi il loro posto per le rimanenti 13 gare da disputarsi alla Dacia Arena. Questo primo segmento della campagna si svolger√† esclusivamente online fino a gioved√¨. Dal 29 ottobre al 4 novembre, i vecchi abbonati potranno esercitare il diritto di prelazione sul proprio posto (no cambio posto), oltre che online, anche presso i punti vendita autorizzati Ticketone e all'Udinese Point operativo in Curva Nord. Il 5 novembre (data unica), solo all'Udinese Point della Curva Nord, sar√† possibile per i vecchi abbonati scegliere un nuovo posto diverso tra quelli rimasti liberi o liberatisi durante le prime due fasi di prelazione. Dal 9 al 14 novembre, poi, la campagna si completer√† aprendo alla vendita libera dei posti ancora disponibili al termine delle fasi di prelazione. Anche quest'anno, Udinese Calcio - informa la societ√† - ha voluto confermare la propria politica dei prezzi calcolando le tariffe in base al costo dell'abbonamento 19/20 mantenendo cos√¨ immutato il rateo. Si rinnovano anche i pacchetti dedicati a sportivi, universitari e la tariffa family dedicata ai nuclei accomunati dalla passione bianconera. Queste tariffe hanno il costo unico di 50 euro per 10 partite (escluse Inter e Milan) e sono sottoscrivibili esclusivamente alla Dacia Arena. (ANSA).

title: Complimenten voor Ajax en Feyenoord: 'Totaalvoetbal uit 1974'
description: Ajax en Feyenoord bewijzen dat het 4-3-3-systeem nog altijd zeer functioneel is in het hedendaagse voetbal. Nog niet zo lang geleden werd gesteld dat die manier van voetballen niet meer zou passen in het moderne voetbal, maar dat is volgens Bert van Marwijk onzin. De oefenmeester ziet ook gelijkenissen tussen het totaalvoetbal uit 1974 en het huidige Ajax.
full_description: 9:53 ‚Äì Ajax en Feyenoord bewijzen dat het 4-3-3-systeem nog altijd zeer functioneel is in het hedendaagse voetbal. Nog niet zo lang geleden werd gesteld dat die manier van voetballen niet meer zou passen in het moderne voetbal, maar dat is volgens Bert van Marwijk onzin. De oefenmeester ziet ook gelijkenissen tussen het totaalvoetbal uit 1974 en het huidige Ajax. 'Ik heb daar nooit in geloofd en op deze plaats ook gezegd dat we de oplossing niet bij anderen moesten zoeken, maar dat we vooral bij onszelf moesten blijven', schrijft de Nederlandse coach in De Telegraaf over het feit dat Nederlandse clubs over de landsgrenzen zouden moeten kijken ter inspiratie. 'Dan heb ik het vooral over onze eigen normen en waarden die ooit goed genoeg waren om ons aan de top te brengen.' Volgens Van Marwijk is in het voetbal alles al een keer uitgevonden en gedaan. 'Daarom heb ik de afgelopen jaren met enige scepsis gekeken naar al die nieuwe termen zoals Vollgasfussball, Gegenpressung, Laptoptrainer en dat plotselinge gedweep met vijf verdedigers. Het waren meestal slechts nieuwe, interessante termen voor dingen die al lang bestonden of het betrof een formatie die meer dan dertig jaar geleden reeds werd gehanteerd.' Het totaalvoetbal is volgens Van Marwijk ook ontstaan uit een spelersgroep met heel veel kwaliteit, wat hij momenteel ook bij Ajax ziet. 'Het positiespel in balbezit waarbij altijd gezocht wordt naar de vrije man en waar we proberen de √©√©n tegen √©√©n in de voorste linie te cre√´ren. Met lef en zelfvertrouwen aan de bal, tempoversnellingen en individuele hoogstandjes. En bij balverlies die drang om zo snel mogelijk de bal te heroveren en de tegenstander bij de keel te grijpen. Ondanks het feit dat bij Borussia Dortmund een spits loopt die op zijn best is in de omschakeling en met ruimte achter de defensie van de tegenstander.' Volgens Van Marwijk hield Ajax onverstoorbaar vast aan zijn eigen speelwijze en hield dat ook negentig minuten vol. 'Ik zag later in de week Feyenoord met dezelfde uitgangspunten domineren en winnen van een andere Duitse ploeg uit de Bundesliga. Op papier in een 4-3-3 formatie, maar in feite valt er door de voortdurende beweging nauwelijks een stempel op te drukken. Net als in 1974 toen het als totaalvoetbal werd omschreven.'

title: Mourinho cambia i prezzi della Roma: da Pellegrini a Kumbulla ecco le variazioni
description: La gestione della rosa del portoghese ha svalutato alcuni giocatori, come Villar e Diawara, ma di altri ha aumentato invece la valutazione di mercato
full_description: I titolari e i nuovi esuberi. La Roma vive una spaccatura evidente tra i fedelissimi di Mourinho e quelli che ormai non fanno pi√π parte del progetto. Lo Special One ha incassato domenica col Napoli la fiducia totale di Abraham e compagni. Alcuni di loro hanno visto senza dubbio aumentare il loro valore di mercato in questo inizio campionato. Mou ha per√≤ usato il pugno duro contro quei giocatori colpevoli, a suo modo di vedere, della sconfitta rimediata in Norvegia. Reynolds, Kumbulla, Villar, Diawara e Borja Mayoral hanno assistito al pareggio rimediato contro il Napoli dalla tribuna dell‚ÄôOlimpico. Il messaggio √® chiaro: fate le valigie. A che prezzo per√≤? Da Diawara a Reynolds: ecco chi scende Quanto valgono ora infatti i cartellini dei cinque esclusi? Tiago Pinto aveva gi√† provato la scorsa estate a vendere Diawara e Villar, incontrando delle difficolt√† non indifferenti. Ora quanto sarebbe la loro valutazione? Diawara partiva da una valutazione di 12-13 milioni di euro (ben lontana dai 21 valutati ai tempi del suo arrivo), una cifra che il Galatasaray era disposto a offrire anche a settembre. Oggi, a meno di miracoli, la valutazione √® scesa di almeno 4 milioni . In Inghilterra il guineano ha ancora un minimo mercato ma non sar√† facile. Stesso discorso di svalutazione per Villar: lo spagnolo poteva generare una ricca plusvalenza in estate considerato che era stato pagato 4 milioni da Petrachi. Oggi arrivano richieste di prestito, ma probabilmente nessuno scommetterebbe pi√π di 6-7 milioni sullo spagnolo. Il caso pi√π complesso √® quello relativo a Kumbulla: nell'estate 2020 fu messo a bilancio per 29.5 milioni di euro , a gennaio lo sar√† per 18,65 milioni . Inevitabilmente, in inverno potr√† andare via solo in prestito o mettendo in conto una minusvalenza considerato che il suo valore √® sceso sui 15 milioni. Identico discorso per l‚Äôamericano Reynolds, strappato alla Juventus al termine di un lungo duello di mercato. Oltre sei milioni, oggi nessuno almeno in Italia ne spenderebbe la met√†. Discorso diverso per Mayoral che non sar√† riscattato per 20 milioni ma che non generer√† alcuna perdita se non quella relativo allo stipendio. Col Napoli la Roma aveva 54 milioni di cartellino (gi√† ammortizzati) sugli spalti che per√≤ a gennaio ne potrebbero fruttare al massimo la met√†. Probabile che alcuni di loro vengano ceduti solo in prestito. E che altri (soprattutto Kumbulla visto il pessimo stato di forma di Smalling) siano costretti a restare per convincere Mourinho. Alla lista si aggiungono Fazio e Santon che continuano la loro vita da turisti per sempre nella capitale. Un duro lavoro per Tiago Pinto che in estate non era riuscito a convincere gli esuberi a prendere altre strade. Oggi, probabilmente, sarebbe pi√π facile. L‚Äôimpresa √® trovare chi li vuole. Pellegrini e i fedelissimi: prezzo che schizza Dall‚Äôaltra parte della medaglia c‚Äô√® la squadra che ha fermata il Napoli e che mantiene il quarto posto in campionato pur senza grandi ricambi. Sono i 13-14 giocatori che Mourinho sta rivalutando tatticamente, mentalmente e anche economicamente. Dopo la debacle della scorsa stagione, ad esempio, erano calate le quotazioni di Ibanez che √® oggi titolare inamovibile della Roma. Il brasiliano sta vivendo il momento migliore della sua carriera. Arrivato dall‚ÄôAtalanta per 8 milioni pi√π bonus due anni fa. Oggi ne vale almeno 25, buona parte anche grazie a Mourinho che vede in lui quel profilo alla Burdisso che serve sempre nelle sue squadre. Aumento di prezzo pure per Cristante. Entra in ballo l‚ÄôEuropeo vinto ma non solo. Mourinho non lo toglierebbe mai dal campo e la bella prestazione col Napoli fa capire perch√©. Il suo valore √® tornato ai tempi dell‚ÄôAtalanta quando fu ceduto alla Roma per 20 milioni pi√π ricchi bonus (per una valutazione complessiva superiore ai 27). Un anno fa era un‚Äôimpresa arrivare a 15. Ha sempre mantenuto un profilo medio-alto Mancini che per√≤ potrebbe migliorare se dovesse dar seguito alla prestazione di domenica. Entrambi sono attesi da rinnovo e da una maglia azzurra. La vera ciliegina √® Lorenzo Pellegrini. Il capitano ha raggiunto con Mou la piena maturit√† diventando leader tecnico del gruppo. Oggi la clausola da 30 milioni non basterebbe. Il numero 7 ha sposato la Roma con un ricco e lungo contratto e il suo cartellino √® ormai schizzato verso quota 50 milioni. Altri giocatori che hanno visto riassestare il loro valore di mercato sono Karsdorp e Carles Perez, pur senza strafare. I prossimi? Ci viene facile scommettere su Zaniolo e Abraham ma occhio pure al ritorno di Veretout.

title: IND vs PAK T20 World Cup: Kohli handled defeat with so much grace, shows he is secure person, says Sana Mir
description: Virat Kohli is a "role model" for being an epitome of grace even in defeat which shows that the India captain is a secure individual, feels former Pakistan women's cricket team skipper Sana Mir.
full_description: is a "role model" for being an epitome of grace even in defeat which shows that the India captain is a secure individual, feels former Pakistan women's cricket team skipper Sana Mir. India lost to Pakistan for the first time in an ICC global event by 10 wickets in the opening Super 12 game of the T20 World Cup on Sunday. However, one of the most endearing images from the match was of the Indian captain hugging winning team hero Mohammed Rizwan. "Virat Kohli handled the defeat with so much grace and I admire his sportsman spirit. It's really good to see the top athletes, who are role models, behaving in the way he did," Mir, a former Pakistan captain, wrote in her column for the ICC's official website. "It shows a lot of security within, and it means they have a lot of confidence to bounce back," she further wrote. Mir won't be surprised if India come back in the tournament with some big wins. "I won't be surprised if India bounce back very quickly and in a big fashion and I hope we can see Pakistan and India play each other again in this tournament." On Pakistan, the legendary woman cricketer said she liked skipper 's attitude of looking immediately towards the next assignment instead of enjoying a prolonged celebration. "With this performance, Pakistan have definitely become one of the favourites for the tournament, but it was heartening to see Babar and Shaheen not get carried away when in front of the media, they were focused on the next games," she said. "It is a great sign that they are staying level-headed and shows the team is going in the right direction," she further wrote.

title: Hardik Pandya injury update: Indian all-rounder announced fit for ICC T20 World Cup game against New Zealand
creator: Rishikesh Sharma
description: Hardik Pandya injury update: The all-rounder has been cleared to face New Zealand after a shoulder injury scare against Pakistan. After all the negativity for Team India after the defeat against Pakistan, India finally got one good news. All-rounder Hardik Pandya has been adjudged fit to face New Zealand on 31 October. The all-rounder got‚Ä¶ The post Hardik Pandya injury update: Indian all-rounder announced fit for ICC T20 World Cup game against New Zealand appeared first on The SportsRush.
content: Hardik Pandya injury update: The all-rounder has been cleared to face New Zealand after a shoulder injury scare against Pakistan. After all the negativity for Team India after the defeat against Pakistan, India finally got one good news. All-rounder Hardik Pandya has been adjudged fit to face New Zealand on 31 October. The all-rounder got hurt on his shoulder while batting in the game against Pakistan. He then didn‚Äôt take the field and Ishan Kishan came on as his replacement. He was then taken for scans during the game. ‚ÄúHardik Pandya was hit on his right shoulder while batting. He has now gone for scans,‚Äù the BCCI informed earlier. Hardik Pandya plays an important part in giving a balance to team India. He can bat the number six slot, whereas Pandya can also fulfill the role of the 6th bowler in the team. But, the injury of Hardik Pandya has been an everlasting issue. Hardik Pandya Injury update A BCCI official has confirmed that Hardik Pandya is not seriously injured and will be available to play the game against New Zealand. ‚ÄúThere is no issue and he is already feeling good. It was just a precautionary scan and the team management didn‚Äôt wish to take a chance‚Äù India all-rounder Hardik Pandya is fit and raring to go for the second game against New Zealand..the scan report of the shoulder is in and he is fine..full report on @ANI#HardikPandya #TeamIndia #T20WorldCup #INDvNZ ‚Äî Baidurjo Bhose (@bbhose) October 25, 2021 When Hardik was involved in the T20 World Cup squad, the selectors mentioned that he will bowl in the tournament. However, he didn‚Äôt bowl a single ball in IPL‚Äôs second leg, whereas he also missed a couple of games. Pandya later informed that he is getting ready to bowl in the knockout stages of the World Cup. ‚ÄúThe back is fine, it was jittery, but I won‚Äôt be bowling for now. I want to be able to bowl eventually, closer to the knockouts. The professionals and I both have to take the call about when I can have a bowl.‚Äù Virat Kohli has also backed the position of Hardik Pandya in the side. ‚Äú[Hardik‚Äôs] physical condition is getting better in terms of being prepared to bowl at least two overs at a certain stage in this tournament. We strongly believe we can make the most of the opportunity at hand till he starts bowling,‚Äù Virat said earlier. The post Hardik Pandya injury update: Indian all-rounder announced fit for ICC T20 World Cup game against New Zealand appeared first on The SportsRush.

title: Newcastle United: Ex-BVB-Coach Lucien Favre offenbar Trainer-Wunschl√∂sung der Saudis
description: Newcastle United ist weiter auf der Suche nach einem neuen Trainer - √ºbernimmt nun Ex-BVB-Coach Lucien Favre das Amt?
content: Newcastle United ist weiter auf der Suche nach einem neuen Trainer - √ºbernimmt nun Ex-BVB-Coach Lucien Favre das Amt?Newcastle United befindet sich nach der Trennung von Steve Bruce weiterhin auf der Suche nach einem neuen Cheftrainer. Der schon l√§nger gehandelte Lucien Favre soll laut der Bild -Zeitung nun der Favorit sein.Demnach soll der 63-J√§hrige ganz oben auf der Wunschliste der Magpies stehen. Die Entscheidung soll sp√§testens in der kommenden Woche bekannt gegeben werden.Seit dem Einstieg der saudischen Investoren um Kronprinz Mohammed bin Salman ranken sich zahlreiche Ger√ºchte um den Verein. Schon im Januar sollen die ersten gr√∂√üeren Spielertransfers get√§tigt werden. Der neue Trainer soll im besten Fall mit in die Kaderplanung eingebunden werden, weshalb nach einer baldigen L√∂sung gesucht wird.Neben Favre wurden auch Frank Lampard, Steven Gerrard und Paulo Fonseca als potenzielle Nachfolger von Bruce gehandelt, nachdem dieser vergangene Woche seine Position als Teammanager im "gegenseitigen Einvernehmen" aufgegeben hatte.Fonesca galt in den englischen Medien lange als Favorit auf den vakanten Posten. Die Gespr√§che seien zuletzt schon weit fortgeschritten gewesen. Anteilseignerin Amanda Staveley wollte den ehemaligen Roma-Coach demnach f√ºr ein Jahresgehalt von rund sieben Millionen Euro unter Vertrag nehmen.Lampard soll Newcastle abgesagt habenLampard entschied sich laut Mirror gegen ein Engagement bei Newcastle. Er sei lange der Wunschtrainer von Anteilseigner Jamie Reuben gewesen. Dass Gerrard die Glasgow Rangers in Richtung des neureichen Klubs verl√§sst, gilt zudem als unwahrscheinlich.Das Konsortium rund um den h√∂chst umstrittenen Kronprinzen hatte Newcastle zuletzt f√ºr umgerechnet rund 350 Millionen Euro √ºbernommen. Trotz vehementer Kritik von Menschenrechtsorganisationen hatte die Premier League den Deal durchgewunken.

title: Derby near miss fires up Kersley to win first Group 1
description: The bitterness of running second in the $2m Group 1 Victoria Derby last year has fuelled Fred Kersley‚Äôs desire to be first past the post on Saturday.
full_description: The bitterness of running second in the $2m Group 1 Victoria Derby last year has fuelled Fred Kersley‚Äôs desire to be first past the post on Saturday. Kersley again came gut-wrenchingly short of a maiden Group 1 success earlier in the carnival when second, by the barest of margins, in the Sir Rupert Clarke Stakes. The 22-year-old jockey will sport the Godolphin blue in two Group 1s on Saturday, including $26 Derby contender Character and Kallos, in the $1.5m Group 1 Coolmore Stud Stakes. Kersley won the Group 2 Danehill Stakes on Kallos last start at Flemington. Character has drawn barrier 10 in the Derby outside of stablemate Alegron, a $9 equal third favourite. ‚ÄúIt was frustrating (running second) last year but that adds fuel to the fire and I‚Äôve found myself on a nice horse in Character,‚Äú Kersley said. ‚ÄúHe did a nice piece of work on the (Flemington) course proper and gave me a good feel. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôll be going into the weekend with some confidence.‚Äù Character was runner-up in the Geelong Classic last start behind Tutukaka. Unlike a number of his opposition on Saturday the three-year-old son of Teofilo is seasoned for the 2500m challenge, having faced the starter 10 times since January for a win and three minor placings. ‚ÄúIt was a great second (Geelong Classic),‚Äú Kersley said. ‚ÄúArguably if we had have had something to chase down then he goes close to winning. ‚ÄúBut he‚Äôs really taken me by surprise. He‚Äôs made good progression from each run and although he is deep into a prep he is still progressing. ‚ÄúIf we can have a bit of luck in running and have a couple to chase down in the straight then he‚Äôll put in a good showing.‚Äù Derby favourite Forgot You has drawn perfectly in barrier eight, but second elect Gunstock must overcome gate 15 after scratchings. ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre two impressive horses,‚Äú Kersley said. ‚ÄúThey‚Äôve had faultless preps going in to Saturday. ‚ÄúIf we can have a better run than they do and with a smidgen of luck, there‚Äôs no question about our fella seeing out the distance and with the blinkers on he‚Äôll give a good showing.‚Äù Kersley has been booked to ride Master Of Wine for Team Hawkes in the Melbourne Cup on Tuesday. Originally published as Fred Kersley fired up to win Victoria Derby after near miss last year To join the conversation, please log in. Don't have an account? Register Join the conversation, you are commenting as Logout Racing Victoria is scrambling to fix a vital CT scanner after an untimely and unforeseen breakdown a week out from the Melbourne Cup. Epsom Handicap winner Private Eye has drawn near the outside for Saturday‚Äôs Golden Eagle but trainer Joe Pride just wants a solid tempo in the $7.5 million feature. When cancer survivor Felicity Krzanic received a slot in the Four Pillars, she settled on a horse renowned for his fighting spirit, just like her close friend Nini Vascotto.

title: Hoene√ü attackiert Medien: STIKO-Chef h√§lt Kimmich-Debatte f√ºr "Unfug"

content: Thomas Mertens, der Vorsitzende der St√§ndigen Impfkommission, legt in der Kimmich-Debatte nach. Der 71-J√§hrige h√§lt diese f√ºr "grenzenlosen Unfug". Kimmichs exponierte Stellung als Nationalspieler trage dazu bei. W√§hrenddessen attackiert Uli Hoene√ü die Medien.
full_description: Thomas Mertens, der Vorsitzende der St√§ndigen Impfkommission, legt in der Kimmich-Debatte nach. Der 71-J√§hrige h√§lt diese f√ºr "grenzenlosen Unfug". Kimmichs exponierte Stellung als Nationalspieler trage dazu bei. W√§hrenddessen attackiert Uli Hoene√ü die Medien. Der Vorsitzende der St√§ndigen Impfkommission (STIKO), Thomas Mertens, h√§lt die √∂ffentliche Diskussion um den Impfstatus von Fu√üball-Nationalspieler Joshua Kimmich f√ºr √ºberzogen. "Es ist die pers√∂nliche Entscheidung von Kimmich, und die soll es auch bleiben! Die Debatte um Kimmich ist ein grenzenloser Unfug", sagte Mertens (71) der "Bild"-Zeitung. Man w√ºrde niemals √ºber private medizinische Entscheidungen von Kimmich diskutieren, "w√§re er als Fu√üball-Profi nicht derart exponiert", erkl√§rte der STIKO-Vorsitzende. Das 18-k√∂pfige Expertengremium spricht die Empfehlungen f√ºr die Anwendung von Impfstoffen in Deutschland aus. Bayern-Profi Kimmich hatte am Samstag einger√§umt, bislang nicht gegen das Coronavirus geimpft zu sein und damit f√ºr eine emotionale Debatte gesorgt. Er habe "pers√∂nlich noch ein paar Bedenken, gerade, was fehlende Langzeitstudien angeht", hatte Kimmich erkl√§rt. Er sage nicht kategorisch, dass er sich "√ºberhaupt nicht impfen lasse". Es sei "auch sehr gut m√∂glich, dass ich mich in Zukunft impfen lasse", betonte Kimmich. Die Bedenken Kimmichs hatte Mertens bereits vorher zur√ºckgewiesen und unter Verweis auf Zulassungsstudien erkl√§rt, dass es bisher nur "zu einigen Nebenwirkungen gekommen ist, die alle recht kurze Zeit nach der Impfung aufgetreten sind". In der Wissenschaft sei man sich einig, dass sp√§t auftretende Nebenwirkungen nach einer Impfung "nicht vorkommen, beziehungsweise eine extrem seltene Rarit√§t bei einzelnen Impfstoffen" gewesen seien. "Dass es bei der Anwendung eines Impfstoffes √ºber knapp ein Jahr keine Zehnjahres-Beobachtungsstudien geben kann, ist klar", hatte Mertens gesagt. Auch Bayern-Ehrenpr√§sident Uli Hoene√ü h√§lt die Kimmich-Debatte f√ºr √ºbertrieben. Am Rande einer Premierenfeier in M√ºnchen √§u√üerte sich der 69-J√§hrige zu der Rolle der Medien. Die sieht er als Triebfeder der Impf-Debatte. "Sie sind doch verantwortlich f√ºr den Tsunami", sagte Hoene√ü, der Kimmichs Entscheidung nicht weiter kommentieren wollte. Zwar habe er eine Meinung dazu, doch "der einzige, mit dem ich in diesem Zusammenhang rede, ist der Joshua selbst".

title: Ashes: Ben Stokes‚Äôs return will send shivers up Australian spines, says former England captain Michael Vaughan
description: Ben Stokes‚Äôs return will send shivers up Australian spines: Michael Vaughan
full_description: Former England captain Michael Vaughan on Tuesday said the return of Ben Stokes for the upcoming Ashes will send shivers up Australian spines. Ben Stokes, who had taken an indefinite break from cricket in July to focus on his mental health. The star all-rounder is also recovering from a second operation on a broken finger. Stokes was not included in coach Chris Silverwood's initial squad for the series. However, the England and Wales Cricket Board said on Monday, however, that Stokes would be available for the series, which is due to start on December 8. "Ben Stokes's return for the Ashes is huge," Vaughan wrote in his column in the Daily Telegraph. "Without him, I would not have given England a chance in Australia; with him, they have a glimmer of hope -- and maybe a bit more than that. "Stokes is the engine of this England team, the guy who powers them. Not only does he contribute massively himself, he lifts the performances of those around him, inspiring, cajoling and driving up standards." Regarded as one of the greatest batting displays in living memory, Stokes hit 135 not out, smashing the ball to all parts of the ground in a virtuoso display that included eight sixes, to give Joe Root's team a thrilling one-wicket victory. "Crucially, he is also a player Australia fear," added Vaughan. "The scars he inflicted on them at Headingley two years ago will not have fully healed, and the sight of him walking out at Brisbane -- or wherever he manages to play his first test -- will send a few shivers up local spines." title: Knights‚Äô stunning move amid Pearce drama
description: The Newcastle Knights have revealed the return of the club‚Äôs favourite son as Andrew Johns joined the club as a coaching consultant.
full_description: The Newcastle Knights have revealed the return of the club‚Äôs favourite son as Andrew Johns joined the club as a coaching consultant. Johns, who had been working with the Parramatta Eels spine over the past two Covid affected seasons, is one of the most sought after names to assist the development of halves. Catch all the ICC T20 World Cup action live & exclusive to Fox Cricket, available on Kayo. New to Kayo? Start your free trial today. He has been widely credited with the development of Eels halfback Mitchell Moses into a genuine star, including making his Origin debut for the NSW Blues in 2021. But amid word that Knights halfback Mitchell Pearce is set to walk away from the club to replace former NRL star James Maloney at Super League club Catalans, Newcastle are in a state of uncertainty over their halves. The Knights do have halves including former Dragon Adam Clune, former Cowboy Jake Clifford and even fullback Kalyn Ponga able to form a new look halves combination, assuming the Pearce deal is made . The Knights trumpeted the decision on Tuesday afternoon, as Knights CEO Philip Gardner praised the homecoming of the eighth rugby league Immortal. ‚ÄúHaving Andrew join the staff is a significant moment in the history of our Club,‚Äù Mr Gardner said. ‚ÄúHis Rugby League knowledge is unmatched anywhere in the world and he will be an excellent addition to the team. ‚ÄúJoey‚Äôs return marks the beginning of an incredibly exciting period in our Club‚Äôs history and we can‚Äôt wait to see him get to work.‚Äù The 47-year-old will work for the Knights covering the attack and halves two days per week, while continuing his commentary work for Channel 9. Johns is an all-time legend for the Knights, having played 249 games, won premierships in 1997 and 2001, won three Dally M Medals and has the fifth most points in Australian rugby league history at 2176. He played his entire career, apart from three games he played on loan to the Warrington Wolves in the UK Super League in 2005, for the Knights. The news comes in the middle of the Pearce drama as coach Adam O‚ÄôBrien told The Daily Telegraph that nobody at the Knights had ‚Äúheard a single sentence‚Äù from Pearce or his manager. That news was met with criticism from Channel 7‚Äôs Michelle Bishop who said O‚ÄôBrien trying to plan to keep Pearce would ‚Äúbe his downfall‚Äù . Fox Sports said that the Knights were attempting to get a transfer fee for Pearce to make the deal. Johns is not afraid to speak his mind however. Last month he said Pearce should leave the Knights for Catalans. Johns also said he wouldn‚Äôt have picked Moses for the Blues despite being both an assistant under NSW coach Brad Fittler and Moses‚Äô mentor at Parramatta at the time. He did however defend Moses after the Blues‚Äô Origin III loss. Speaking to news.com.au before the 2021 season, Moses said that Johns played a huge role in the development of the Eels‚Äô spine, despite being locked out of training sessions in 2020. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs outstanding. He‚Äôs one of the best halfbacks to play the game in my eyes and I looked up to him as a young kid so to be working with him at the moment is something special,‚Äù Moses said at the time. It seems that Parramatta‚Äôs loss is Newcastle‚Äôs gain. A former NSW Origin player who was banned for steroids is on the comeback trail now that a barrier has been removed by the NRL. The Knights have been accused of failing to tell the whole story about the rumours surrounding Mitchell Pearce and Luke Brooks. Peter V‚Äôlandys has been instrumental in pulling the NRL through two Covid-ravaged seasons, but this comment left fans scratching their heads.

title: Saarbr√ºckens G√ºnther-Schmidt - ‚ÄûDann gewinnen wir eben gegen Waldhof und Lautern!‚Äú
description: Eigentlich ist Drittligist Saarbr√ºcken auf einem guten Weg, nur zweimal in Folge gewinnen konnte der FCS bisher noch nicht. Gelingt das nun?Foto: Andreas Schlichter
full_description: Besiegt Saarbr√ºcken den Doppel-Sieg-Fluch in den Derby-Wochen? Eigentlich ist Drittligist Saarbr√ºcken auf einem guten Weg. title: Man Utd include PL boss on four-man shortlist to replace Ole
creator: Joe Williams
description: The under-fire Man Utd boss called ‚Ä¶ The post Man Utd include PL boss on four-man shortlist to replace Ole appeared first on Football365.
content: Man Utd have included Leicester City boss Brendan Rodgers on a four-man shortlist to replace Ole Gunnar Solskjaer at Old Trafford, according to reports. The Red Devils‚Äô 5-0 drubbing against Liverpool could have immediate ramifications for manager Solskjaer, with the Manchester Evening News reporting he could be sacked before United‚Äôs next game at Tottenham on Saturday. The under-fire Man Utd boss called Sunday‚Äôs home defeat to Jurgen Klopp‚Äôs team the ‚Äúdarkest day‚Äù of his near three years in the dugout, admitting they had hit ‚Äúrock bottom‚Äù. Topical Top Ten: Manchester United‚Äôs worst Premier League defeats Liverpool‚Äôs biggest ever Old Trafford win compounded poor recent performances and will test the United hierarchy‚Äôs support of a man they gave a new three-year deal to over the summer. Those in the corridors of power are well aware of how damaging Sunday‚Äôs loss was and, despite some dissatisfied murmurings beginning to seep out of the dressing room, there is yet to be a concrete update on Solskjaer. However, The Sun claim the Man Utd hierarchy are lining up potential replacements as they consider Solskjaer‚Äôs future at Old Trafford. It is understood that the board have ‚Äòdrawn up a four-man shortlist‚Äô and have ‚Äòsounded out‚Äô Antonio Conte and Zinedine Zidane as their top targets. Man Utd want to know if either of the pair ‚Äòwould be interested in the job‚Äô with Ajax boss Erik Ten Hag and Leicester City manager Brendan Rodgers ‚Äòalso on the shortlist‚Äô. The report adds that the board have realised they ‚Äòcan no longer ignore the shocking downturn in form and results‚Äô but that ‚Äòa sudden upturn in results could yet save Solskjaer‚Äô. Criticism of the dreadful display against Liverpool has been widespread, with left-back Luke Shaw ‚Äì so impressive last season and for England at Euro 2020 ‚Äì holding his hands up. ‚ÄúNot good enough,‚Äù Shaw said. ‚ÄúI know of course this game is a team sport, a team game, but I think as individuals we need to be accountable of some of the performances today. ‚ÄúAnd that‚Äôs why I‚Äôm here now. I‚Äôm not hiding in there (in the dressing room), not speaking. ‚ÄúI come out, I say wasn‚Äôt good enough and I speak on behalf of myself, not the team. I‚Äôm accountable for my performance and it wasn‚Äôt good enough. ‚ÄúLike I said, I‚Äôm not here to speak about the team. We know we can be better but for me also I need to be better than I was today. That‚Äôs why I come here now, not hide, speak to you, and tell it how it is.‚Äù ¬† The post Man Utd include PL boss on four-man shortlist to replace Ole appeared first on Football365.

title: SA vs WI T20 Head to Head Records | South Africa vs West Indies T20I Stats | Dubai T20I
creator: Dixit Bhargav
description: SA vs WI T20 Head to Head: The SportsRush presents for you the Head to Head statistics for the SA vs WI T20 World Cup match. The 18th match of the ongoing ICC T20 World Cup 2021 will be played between South Africa and West Indies in Dubai today. With both South Africa and West‚Ä¶ The post SA vs WI T20 Head to Head Records | South Africa vs West Indies T20I Stats | Dubai T20I appeared first on The SportsRush.
content: SA vs WI T20 Head to Head: The SportsRush presents for you the Head to Head statistics for the SA vs WI T20 World Cup match. The 18th match of the ongoing ICC T20 World Cup 2021 will be played between South Africa and West Indies in Dubai today. With both South Africa and West Indies losing their first Super 12 match against Australia and England respectively, they would be eager to return to winning ways. South Africa, who had defeated defending champions West Indies 3-2 in a five-match series earlier this year, hold a slight advantage less because of their current form and more because of West Indies‚Äô poor form. With their batting unit registering scores of 130/7, 133/5 and 55 in two warm-up matches and a league match in this tournament, they badly need an archetype T20 innings from at least one of their archetype T20 superstars. As far as their past record is concerned, the Proteas hold an edge on paper as well. Just a few hours until it‚Äôs time to RALLY with #MissionMaroon in our second match of the @T20WorldCup! What are you looking forward to most, as WI clash with @OfficialCSA? #WorldChampions pic.twitter.com/PyIUErjX1E ‚Äî Windies Cricket (@windiescricket) October 26, 2021 SA vs WI T20 Head to Head Records Total number of matches played: 15 Matches won by SA: 9 Matches won by WI: 6 Matches played in Asia: 1 (SA 0, WI 1) Matches played at neutral venues: 2 (SA 1, WI 1) Matches played in ICC T20 World Cup: 3 (SA 2, WI 1) SA average score against WI: 157 WI average score against SA: 149 Most runs for SA: 302 (Quinton de Kock) Most runs for WI: 363 (Chris Gayle) Most wickets for SA: 8 (Kagiso Rabada) Most wickets for WI: 15 (Dwayne Bravo) Most catches for SA: 5 (Aiden Markram, Quinton de Kock and David Miller) Most catches for WI: 7 (Andre Fletcher) The last time when South Africa and West Indies had locked horns against each other in a T20I was at the National Cricket Stadium in St George‚Äôs in July this year. After captain Temba Bavuma had won the toss and chose to bat, South Africa had put on board 168/4 in 20 overs on the back of a match-winning 128-run partnership between Quinton de Kock (60) and Aiden Markram (70). Despite opening batter Evin Lewis scoring 52 (34), West Indies had ended losing by 25 runs. The post SA vs WI T20 Head to Head Records | South Africa vs West Indies T20I Stats | Dubai T20I appeared first on The SportsRush.

content: NATE DIAZ will leave the UFC after his contract expires to fight Jake Paul for up to ¬£10million, his former opponent predicted. Diaz has just one bout left on his current UFC contract and recently hinted at facing Tony Ferguson. GettyConor McGregor is 1-1 with UFC rival Nate Diaz[/caption] GettyYouTuber star-turned 4-0 boxer Jake Paul[/caption] So far, he is yet to extend his deal and Josh Thompson believes the American is eyeing a lucrative boxing switch to fight Paul over a trilogy with Conor McGregor. Thompson, 43, said on his Weighing In podcast: ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs leaving the UFC, he‚Äôs fighting Jake Paul. Just stop, OK. ‚ÄúThis is his last fight, he‚Äôs not fighting in the UFC anymore. He‚Äôs going to leave and he‚Äôs going to fight Jake Paul. ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs just trying to get a fight to get out the door, he‚Äôs done with MMA. He knows that fight is going to make him double then he‚Äôd make [against McGregor]. ‚ÄúConor‚Äôs not that draw anymore that he once was. Conor can‚Äôt get out of his contract, he‚Äôs on an eight or ten fight deal I believe. ‚ÄúSo he‚Äôs stuck with the UFC forever. Speaking from a Nate point of view, I think Nate‚Äôs going to leave and end up fighting Jake Paul in boxing.‚Äù Most read in Boxing HE'LL PAUL IT OFF Jake Paul tipped to beat Tommy Fury by UFC legend Michael Bisping FATE OF THE FURY-OUS Tyson Fury to return in March against Dillian Whyte or Joe Joyce EU CAN'T BE SERIOUS! Eubank Jr facing huge bill after ¬£66k eBay bid on microwave he signed TY-ME ALMOST UP? Paris Fury reveals when husband Tyson will retire from boxing LOVE STRUCK Paris Fury hits back at claims she is only with husband Tyson 'for the money' BRIT SPECIAL Fury‚Äôs next fight will be in March against Whyte or Joyce, says promoter Arum Diaz, 37, beat McGregor, 33, in March 2016 but lost the rematch in a modern classic just five months later. The trilogy decider is yet to materialise despite the pair regularly goading each other online. But Thompson, the only man to ever KO Diaz in the UFC, believes the rubber match could take place in the boxing ring. And he claimed his old rival could end up making over TRIPLE the money to fight YouTuber-turned 4-0 boxer Paul opposed to McGregor. Thompson said: ‚ÄúI know he can make any more from between $10 to $15million (¬£10m) to do that one fight versus him having to fight Conor and make $2million, maybe $4million (¬£2.9m). ‚ÄúWhy? When he can fight one time in boxing against somebody who he‚Äôs got a lot more experience against and against somebody his brother knows. ‚ÄúIf Nate goes and beats Jake Paul, then I can see Dana saying, ‚ÄòOK, let‚Äôs fight Nate in boxing‚Äô. I couldn‚Äôt see him doing it before, he has to beat Jake Paul first. ‚ÄúIf he beats Jake Paul I can see him riding Conor in to be like, ‚ÄòNate and [Conor] in boxing makes sense‚Äô. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a trilogy fight but not a trilogy fight because it‚Äôs in boxing not in MMA.‚Äù

Ski-Sch√∂nheit rast zum Sieg - ihr neuer Freund jubelt im Ziel, auch Neureuther schw√§rmt
creator: Christoph Klaucke
description: Es war eine irre Aufholjagd, die ihr zum Sieg beim Weltcup-Auftakt in S√∂lden verhalf. Der neue Freund von Ski-Star Mikaela Shiffrin hatte daran gro√üen Anteil.
full_description: Es war eine irre Aufholjagd, die ihr zum Sieg beim Weltcup-Auftakt in S√∂lden verhalf. Der neue Freund von Ski-Star Mikaela Shiffrin hatte daran gro√üen Anteil. S√∂lden - Sie ist einfach die Beste ihres Fachs. Die Ski-Queen Mikaela Shiffrin hat direkt zum Start der neuen Wintersport-Saison ein dickes Ausrufezeichen gesetzt und den ersten Sieg geholt. Dass die US-Amerikanerin gleich zum Auftakt der Olympia-Saison im nervenaufreibenden Riesenslalom von S√∂lden ihren 70. Weltcup-Sieg feiern konnte, hatte sie auch dem neuen Mann an ihrer Seite zu verdanken. Shiffrin hat erst vor kurzem ihr Liebesgeheimnis mit dem norwegischen Ski-Rennl√§ufer Aleksander Aamodt Kilde gel√ºftet. In S√∂lden jubelte ihr neuer Freund an der Strecke - zuvor gab er seiner Heldin aber wertvolle Tipps. ‚ÄûIch dachte immer, einen Freund hier zu haben, lenke nur ab. Aber er gibt mir so viel Motivation und Energie, es ist einfach toll‚Äú, erz√§hlte Shiffrin im ARD-Interview. Befl√ºgelt von ihrem ganz besonderen ‚ÄûFan‚Äú entriss die Olympiasiegerin im packenden Finale auf dem Rettenbachferner Weltmeisterin Lara Gut-Behrami noch den Sieg. ‚ÄûEs ist wundersch√∂n einen Menschen an der Seite zu haben, mit dem man √ºber alles reden kann‚Äú, sagte sie. Nicht nur, aber auch √ºber den Beruf. Kilde, Gesamtweltcupsieger 2020, hatte ihr vor dem zweiten Lauf empfohlen, alle Vorsicht √ºber Bord zu werfen und ‚Äûmehr Gas‚Äú zu geben. Schlie√ülich war der oft launige Gletscher diesmal ein perfekter Untergrund. Shiffrin folgte dem Rat - und lag am Ende 0,14 Sekunden vor Gut-Behrami. ‚ÄûDas war eine absolute Demonstration der St√§rke. Es ist ein Traum, ihr zuschauen zu d√ºrfen‚Äú, schw√§rmte ARD-Experte Felix Neureuther . ${caption} ${footer} ${time} 70 Siege - ‚Äûdas ist unglaublich‚Äú, sagte Shiffrin, ‚Äûich bin wirklich stolz‚Äú. Bei der Siegerehrung k√§mpfte sie mit den Tr√§nen. Seit dem Tod ihres Vaters Jeff im Februar 2020 hatten sich bei der langj√§hrigen Dominatorin Zweifel breit gemacht, daran √§nderten auch die vier WM-Medaillen vor acht Monaten wenig .Vor S√∂lden habe sie sich gefragt: ‚ÄûKann ich wirklich wieder gewinnen? Kann ich mit dem Feuer fahren, das ich vorher hatte?‚Äú, berichtete die 26-J√§hrige. Doch bei all der Nervosit√§t sei sie sich sicher gewesen bei dem, was sie tat - auch dank Kilde. Der 29-j√§hrige Norweger verzichtet nach seinem Kreuzbandriss vor neun Monaten noch auf einen Start und konzentriert sich auf die ersten Speed-Rennen in Lake Louise (Kanada) Ende November. Das verschaffte Shiffrin ein einmaliges Erlebnis: ein Rennen samt Sieg vor den Augen ihres Freundes. ‚ÄûEs ist etwas Besonders, das wird wahrscheinlich nie wieder in meiner Karriere passieren. Ich bin so aufgeregt, dass er hier ist‚Äú, verriet Shiffrin. Vielleicht kann es Kilde ja doch noch einmal einrichten, bevor er sich wieder selbst die Bretter anschnallt. Dass er seiner Freundin Gl√ºck bringt, ist nur allzu offensichtlich. (ck/sid) Rubriklistenbild: ¬© ESPA Photo Agency via www.imago-images.de

title: Rafael Benitez could turn against Everton owner Farhad Moshiri as he and Marcel Brands fail to get the most out of transfers, warns Simon Jordan
creator: Mitul Samji
description: Simon Jordan believes Everton manager Rafael Benitez could turn on club owner Farhad Moshiri after their surprise 5-2 home defeat against Watford.¬† After a promising start to the season, the Merseysiders‚Äô recent form has dipped with just one win in their last six matches in all competitions. Big questions are being asked over the club‚Äôs [‚Ä¶]
content: Simon Jordan believes Everton manager Rafael Benitez could turn on club owner Farhad Moshiri after their surprise 5-2 home defeat against Watford.¬† After a promising start to the season, the Merseysiders‚Äô recent form has dipped with just one win in their last six matches in all competitions. Everton capitulated completely at Goodison Park last weekendAFP Big questions are being asked over the club‚Äôs transfer policy with the side severely weakened by injuries to key players. Former Liverpool midfielder Danny Murphy said: ‚ÄúThey‚Äôve started really well with the 11 or 12 players that got them into that position and they‚Äôve lost three or four of their best players in Dominic Calvert-Lewin, Richarlison, Abdoulaye Doucoure and Yerry Mina. ‚ÄúThat is not an excuse for the Watford performance but they‚Äôve lost a bit of confidence in recent weeks. I think when you‚Äôre missing your two best goalscorers and you‚Äôre feeling like you have to defend a lot more in games, it‚Äôs harder. ‚ÄúThe way Rafa works and the kind of structure he wants in a team generally takes a little while to get the point across. Murphy is relaxed about Everton despite their recent bad formGetty ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt worry for Everton. I think there will be improvements when those lads get back, they‚Äôre crucial to the way they play of course. But it was disappointing because they capitulated.‚Äù However, Jordan believes if owner Moshiri and director of football Marcel Brands don‚Äôt back the manager, Benitez could turn against them if he doesn‚Äôt see his roster strengthened. Jordan said: ‚ÄúWill there be a departure from the congenial, mild-mannered Benitez who is happy with his lot at Everton to the person that is not getting quite enough support that we‚Äôve seen in other incarnations that will suddenly start briefing the media against the owner? I wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if that came along. ‚ÄúMoshiri has not put the money into this team this year in the same way as before because they‚Äôve been caught by Financial Fair Play. Benitez doesn‚Äôt always have the best relationship with club owners and Jordan believes history could repeat itselfAFP ‚ÄúThe losses are absolutely enormous for Everton right now. It‚Äôs unfathomable how much they‚Äôve lost, some of it because of COVID. But a lot of it is because of the profligacy of their spending regime. ‚ÄúWe talk about these wonderful so-called blueprint merchants like Marcel Brands and say five or six years into this project, with this kind of dough, with Everton not knocking on the door of the top six‚Ä¶ you have to say it‚Äôs his money and he has the right to spend it. ‚ÄúThe Everton fans have the right to question it to some extent as it‚Äôs their club. But they can‚Äôt question how he spends his money.‚Äù

After a promising start to the season, the Merseysiders‚Äô recent form has dipped with just one win in their last six matches in all competitions. Big questions are being asked over the club‚Äôs transfer policy with the side severely weakened by injuries to key players. Former Liverpool midfielder Danny Murphy said: ‚ÄúThey‚Äôve started really well with the 11 or 12 players that got them into that position and they‚Äôve lost three or four of their best players in Dominic Calvert-Lewin , Richarlison, Abdoulaye Doucoure and Yerry Mina. ‚ÄúThat is not an excuse for the Watford performance but they‚Äôve lost a bit of confidence in recent weeks. I think when you‚Äôre missing your two best goalscorers and you‚Äôre feeling like you have to defend a lot more in games, it‚Äôs harder. ‚ÄúThe way Rafa works and the kind of structure he wants in a team generally takes a little while to get the point across. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt worry for Everton. But they can‚Äôt question how he spends his money.‚Äù

title: Gary Neville on Ole is a logical endpoint for football‚Äôs chumocracy
creator: Ian King
description: Neville has found himself between a ‚Ä¶ The post Gary Neville on Ole is a logical endpoint for football‚Äôs chumocracy appeared first on Football365.
content: Gary Neville found himself between a rock and hard place after the match between Liverpool and Manchester United, but why aren‚Äôt pundits allowed to declare an interest and pass? It was difficult not to feel a little sympathy for Neville after the match between Manchester United and Liverpool. Regardless of what many would-be Nostradamuses might now claim, few saw Liverpool‚Äôs 5-0 thrashing of United at Old Trafford coming. Most would have predicted a Liverpool win and many may have believed it would be comfortable, but not that many people would have confidently predicted such total Liverpool victory, to the point that they effectively took their collective foot off the pedal and ran the clock down for a full half hour. Certainly not at Old Trafford. In the Sky Sports studio after the match, Jamie Carragher and Graeme Souness took Neville to task, effectively goading him to say that Ole Gunnar Solskjaer should be sacked immediately. Neville‚Äôs reticence to do so has been widely interpreted as a valiant attempt to stand up for his ‚Äòmate‚Äô in the face of overwhelming evidence that whatever Solskjaer is doing with half a billion pounds‚Äô worth of ‚Äòtalent‚Äô is not working, and that a change is surely necessary if United are to avoid fading into mid-table obscurity for the first time in three decades. Manchester United are now 7th in the Premier League, the same position that they managed under David Moyes in 2013/14. It‚Äôs closer than some people likely realise. For fully twenty minutes, Neville had to stand alone on the subject, as though he is somehow personally responsible for what is going wrong at Old Trafford. Jamie Carragher felt that Ole should go at the end of this season. Graeme Souness believes that Manchester United‚Äôs backroom staff need a complete overhaul. As the minutes passed, Gary was forced into a tighter and tighter corner by the contradictions between what he believes and the evidence of his own eyes. But surely it couldn‚Äôt be, that he could sit there and defend a status quo that produced the cataclysmic 90 minutes of football that we‚Äôd just all watched together, could it? Souness was excoriating of both Solskjaer and United‚Äôs backroom staff, and Gary could only point to Mike Phelan‚Äôs ten years of working with Sir Alex Ferguson as mitigation for him being there. It was, in its own way, enthralling television, and the real shame of it was that they had to break away sooner than most of us would have liked for the American Grand Prix in Austen. At times visibly uncomfortable and grasping for words as though they were floating away from him, his arguments sounded increasingly tenuous as time progressed. It‚Äôs not that Neville wasn‚Äôt critical of the way in which Manchester United played against Liverpool. It‚Äôs more that he is either putting himself or has been put in a tight situation by having to comment on the shortcomings of someone who we may presume to be a personal friend, and whether they should lose their job over them. Of course, the normal rules do not apply here, as they would to the vast majority of us. For most people, getting sacked or resigning from their job would have ramifications in their personal lives, and this may not be the case to anything like the same extent, if all concerned are already multi-millionaires who live in fancy houses. But it still shouldn‚Äôt be difficult to undertstand why Neville would have have found it difficult to say that his friend should be sacked from his job. But this in itself opens up a whole new avenue of questions. If analysts are so close to those that they are expected to talk about, should they even be talking about them in the first place if they can‚Äôt answer as frankly as they‚Äôd like to? For years now, broadcasters have increasingly seemed to believe that pundits should be selected because they have prior experience of a club. Jamie Carragher and Graeme Souness are routinely rolled out for Liverpool matches. The same goes for Gary Neville and Manchester United, and for other pundits and other clubs. And that comes at a cost. It‚Äôs quite likely that, if ever a meeting was held at which this was the topic of conversation, a graph would have been pulled out with ‚ÄúBanter‚Äù on one axis and ‚ÄúEngagement‚Äù on the other. It is very much in the best interests of broadcasters to provoke controversy, which they can do either directly, through having their anchors ask deliberately provocative questions, or indirectly, just by choosing the most combustible combination of guests that they can. In the case of Gary Neville, there are hoards of people who are sitting at home joining in with the goading, willing Neville to call out his friend for their own amusement, because people in the 21st century are weirdly cruel, like that. But that‚Äôs not to say that post-match coverage should be no more than an assortment people standing at a whiteboard, dryly analysing endless reams of statistics. Televised football coverage should be entertaining because football is, at its heart, entertainment. But at the other end of the spectrum, few viewers would want every round of post-match analysis to be a circle of pundits, all decrying the manager of the losing side of the game they‚Äôve just watched. It shouldn‚Äôt be beyond their ken to be able to make the analysis light but incisive, and honest without ending up as a pile-on aimed at those who‚Äôve just had a bad day. News reports emerging from Old Trafford are now making much of this talk irrelevant anyway, with speculation intensifying that Solskjaer will not, as has previously been claimed, be given until the end of this season to right the mess at the club. But broadcasters should look again at the chumocracy of punditry, because when it reaches the point that it did after Manchester United vs Liverpool, it might be worth asking the question of whether it‚Äôs all gone a little too far. ¬† The post Gary Neville on Ole is a logical endpoint for football‚Äôs chumocracy appeared first on Football365.

For most people, getting sacked or resigning from their job would have ramifications in their personal lives, and this may not be the case to anything like the same extent, if all concerned are already multi-millionaires who live in fancy houses. But it still shouldn‚Äôt be difficult to undertstand why Neville would have have found it difficult to say that his friend should be sacked from his job. But this in itself opens up a whole new avenue of questions. If analysts are so close to those that they are expected to talk about, should they even be talking about them in the first place if they can‚Äôt answer as frankly as they‚Äôd like to? For years now, broadcasters have increasingly seemed to believe that pundits should be selected because they have prior experience of a club. Jamie Carragher and Graeme Souness are routinely rolled out for Liverpool matches. The same goes for Gary Neville and Manchester United, and for other pundits and other clubs. And that comes at a cost. It‚Äôs quite likely that, if ever a meeting was held at which this was the topic of conversation, a graph would have been pulled out with ‚ÄúBanter‚Äù on one axis and ‚ÄúEngagement‚Äù on the other. It is very much in the best interests of broadcasters to provoke controversy, which they can do either directly, through having their anchors ask deliberately provocative questions, or indirectly, just by choosing the most combustible combination of guests that they can. In the case of Gary Neville, there are hoards of people who are sitting at home joining in with the goading, willing Neville to call out his friend for their own amusement, because people in the 21st century are weirdly cruel, like that. But that‚Äôs not to say that post-match coverage should be no more than an assortment people standing at a whiteboard, dryly analysing endless reams of statistics. Televised football coverage should be entertaining because football is, at its heart, entertainment. But at the other end of the spectrum, few viewers would want every round of post-match analysis to be a circle of pundits, all decrying the manager of the losing side of the game they‚Äôve just watched. It shouldn‚Äôt be beyond their ken to be able to make the analysis light but incisive, and honest without ending up as a pile-on aimed at those who‚Äôve just had a bad day. News reports emerging from Old Trafford are now making much of this talk irrelevant anyway, with speculation intensifying that Solskjaer will not, as has previously been claimed, be given until the end of this season to right the mess at the club. But broadcasters should look again at the chumocracy of punditry, because when it reaches the point that it did after Manchester United vs Liverpool, it might be worth asking the question of whether it‚Äôs all gone a little too far.

title: Man Utd thumping unsettles Liverpool star, as role under Klopp ‚Äòconfirmed‚Äô
creator: Jonny Whitfield
description: One Liverpool star left Old Trafford on Sunday less happy than his team-mates after the 5-0 win over Man Utd, a report has claimed The post Man Utd thumping unsettles Liverpool star, as role under Klopp ‚Äòconfirmed‚Äô appeared first on TEAMtalk.
content: Liverpool defender Joe Gomez has become frustrated after the win over Manchester United made clear his role under Jurgen Klopp, a report has claimed. The 24-year-old has endured a mixed career at Anfield since signing from Charlton in 2015. While he has enjoyed successful spells in the team, he has also had to sit out through injury. What‚Äôs more, those absences have mostly proved long-term, including ankle and knee problems. Indeed, he sat out the majority of the last campaign. Gomez may be back to full fitness now, but he is again struggling for game time. Virgil van Dijk and Joel Matip have made themselves the first-choice centre-back pairing in the Premier League. However, 90min reports that Gomez learned at Old Trafford on Sunday that he now ranks as fourth-choice behind Ibrahima Konate. That is because summer signing Konate came in to replace Matip as the Reds won a historic game 5-0. The report adds that Gomez had his role under Klopp ‚Äòconfirmed‚Äô by the turn of events. The England international subsequently fears for his role with England if the situation carries on. In fact, 90min adds that Gomez is becoming ‚Äòincreasingly concerned‚Äô and ‚Äòagitated‚Äô. He reportedly believes he is England‚Äôs best option in central defence. He was with Gareth Southgate‚Äôs squad when he suffered his knee injury last season. Gomez wants his place back in the team ahead of the 2022 World Cup. However, the situation has changed. Harry Maguire and John Stones remain England‚Äôs senior centre-back pairing when in a back four. Wolves‚Äô Conor Coady is now a regular squad member and Southgate likes his leadership skills. What‚Äôs more, Ben White has impressed at the heart of Arsenal‚Äôs defence, where he is a nailed-on starter. Fikayo Tomori and Tyrone Mings, meanwhile, made up the most recent squad of defenders. Klopp defends Liverpool‚Äôs Gomez Speaking after October‚Äôs international break, Klopp slammed Southgate for not including Gomez in his squad. Asked what Gomez has to do to get more minutes at Liverpool, the manager said: ‚ÄúNothing special, he‚Äôs in a top shape. I know that Gareth from time to time reacts that if a player‚Äôs not playing regularly at his club then he‚Äôs not playing for his national team. ‚ÄúObviously there‚Äôs a special rule for Mr Stones, but Joe didn‚Äôt get called up. Stuff like this would have helped him to have some games.‚Äù Gomez could get a start on Wednesday when Liverpool travel to Preston in the Carabao Cup. title: Major Warm-Up For Australian Open Tennis Cancelled Again Over COVID-19
description: The Kooyong Classic, a major warm-up tournament for the Australian Open, was cancelled on Tuesday, with organisers blaming uncertainty over Covid-19 rules players will face in Melbourne.
full_description: A major warm-up tournament for the Australian Open was cancelled on Tuesday, with organisers blaming uncertainty over Covid-19 rules players will face in Melbourne. It is the second year the Kooyong Classic, normally played in the weeks leading up to the season-opening Grand Slam, has been scrapped because of the coronavirus pandemic. Kooyong president Adam Cossar said he was disappointed the event could not take place in January 2022 but hopes it will return in 2023. "With the great deal of uncertainty over recent months about the arrangements that would be in place in January, it has not been possible to make the best plans to deliver the best and safest sporting (event)," he said in a statement. Players are still awaiting clarification on whether they need to be fully vaccinated to participate at the Australian Open, also in Melbourne, and other tennis tournaments in the country. Such a requirement would cast doubt on nine-time Australian Open champion Novak Djokovic's ability to defend his title -- he is one of many players who have refused to share their vaccination status. A leaked WTA email this week suggested unvaccinated players could take part provided they completed 14 days in hotel quarantine. Double-jabbed players would though enjoy "complete freedom of movement". However, the Premier of Victoria -- the state where the Grand Slam is held -- said he wanted all players to be fully vaccinated. Promoted "All the people who are watching the tennis at the Australian Open, they're going to be double-vaxxed, all the people that work there are going to be double-vaxxed," Dan Andrews told public radio. "It stands to reason that if you want to get into the country to be part of that tournament, then you should be double-vaxxed as well," he added.

title: England has been given a ‚Äòdangerous‚Äô boost for the Ashes... and Steve Smith is ‚Äòglad‚Äô
description: Australian star Steve Smith says he‚Äôs ‚Äúglad personally‚Äù Ben Stokes will be a member of England‚Äôs touring party for the upcoming Ashes.
full_description: Australian star Steve Smith says he‚Äôs ‚Äúglad personally‚Äù Ben Stokes will be a member of England‚Äôs touring party for the upcoming Ashes. Stokes was not originally included in the 17-player squad list released earlier this month, as he was still recovering from a finger injury sustained during the opening leg of the Indian Premier League. Catch all the ICC T20 World Cup action live & exclusive to Fox Cricket, available on Kayo. New to Kayo? Start your free trial today. The 30-year-old also took time off from the game to focus on his mental health, ruling himself out of England‚Äôs T20 World Cup campaign. But the English all-rounder will look to help his team bring back the Ashes as he looks forward ‚Äúto seeing my mates and being on the field with them‚Äù. Smith, who was a first-hand witness to just how destructive Stokes can be in the red-ball format, believes the return of the Englishman is only good news for the upcoming series. ‚ÄúI think any team‚Äôs more dangerous when you‚Äôve got someone like Ben Stokes playing,‚Äù Smith said. Ben Stokes announced he will be joining the England squad for the upcoming Ashes on Australian soil. Picture: Jon Super / AFP Source: AFP ‚ÄúIt certainly adds a lot to their depth, but like I said we‚Äôre excited and I‚Äôm glad personally that he‚Äôs able to be back playing some cricket. ‚ÄúIt makes for a really good series.‚Äù Stokes‚Äô decision to step away from the game for mental health purposes was one that was applauded by many in not just cricket, but the sporting arena in general. He isn‚Äôt the first cricketer to take some time off for those reasons, either. Australian stars Glenn Maxwell and Will Pucovski are two other high-profile examples. Maxwell announced he would take a break from cricket for mental health reasons in October 2019. A year earlier, Pucovski stepped away from cricket due to a mental health-related illness and also withdrew from the Australian Test squad in the series against Sri Lanka so he could continue working on his mental health in January 2019. Smith praised the England and Wales Cricket Board (ECB) for accepting Stokes‚Äô decision and also admitted his delight at seeing society take a progressive outlook on mental health as a whole. ‚ÄúI think we‚Äôve seen it a lot more now, the acceptance of people when they‚Äôre not doing well mentally,‚Äù Smith said. ‚ÄúCredit to Ben for being able to make that decision and step away for a bit and make sure he‚Äôs right to go out and play and live his life. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs more out there sometimes than the game of cricket. ‚ÄúFor him to be able to make the decision to step away, and from the acceptance from the ECB and everyone involved, I think that's really important for people going forward.‚Äù Steve Smith praised the ECB for accepting Stokes‚Äô decision to take a break from cricket for mental health purposes. Picture: Bradley Kanaris / Getty Images Source: Getty Images

title: ‚ÄúCricket has become the 2nd most popular sport on the planet‚Äù: Shane Warne lauds the valuation of two new IPL 2022 teams
creator: Rishikesh Sharma
description: Australian legend Shane Warne has called cricket the second most popular sport after the grand valuation of IPL 2022 teams. Shane Warne was left amused after the two new teams of IPL went for a whopping price. BCCI conducted the bidding ceremony for the two new IPL teams in Dubai on 25 October 2021. The‚Ä¶ The post ‚ÄúCricket has become the 2nd most popular sport on the planet‚Äù: Shane Warne lauds the valuation of two new IPL 2022 teams appeared first on The SportsRush.
content: Australian legend Shane Warne has called cricket the second most popular sport after the grand valuation of IPL 2022 teams. Shane Warne was left amused after the two new teams of IPL went for a whopping price. BCCI conducted the bidding ceremony for the two new IPL teams in Dubai on 25 October 2021. The tournament will be played between ten teams from the next season. From the six cities available, the new franchises chose Lucknow and Ahmedabad to be their bases. The RPSG group and CVC Capitals were the successful bidders in the BCCI event. RPSG group were the highest bidders with INR 7090 Cr, whereas CVC Capitals were the second highest with INR 5625 Cr. Lucknow will be the base city of the RPSG Group, whereas Ahmedabad will be of CVC Capitals. There were a total of nine parties involved in the bidding process, but only two of them were successful. Glazers were the lowest bidders with a price of just INR 4000 Cr, but the biggest surprise was Adani Group. Adani‚Äôs were considered the favourites to win the bid, but their bid was way too low comparatively. Shane Warne on IPL team prices Australian legend Shane Warne tweeted to appreciate the effort, whereas he also called Cricket the second biggest sport on the planet. He went on to Twitter and wrote, ‚ÄúWow! Congratulations to both of the new franchise owners. Staggering amounts of money for each team & shows why cricket has become the 2nd most popular & biggest sport on the planet. $932 & $692 million dollars (USA). Well done to @SGanguly99 & everyone at the @BCCI on the @IPL.‚Äù Wow ! Congratulations to both of the new franchise owners. Staggering amounts of money for each team & shows why cricket has become the 2nd most popular & biggest sport on the planet. $932 & $692 million dollars (USA). Well done to @SGanguly99 & everyone at the @BCCI on the @IPL https://t.co/pFkhKqv9ln ‚Äî Shane Warne (@ShaneWarne) October 25, 2021 BCCI president Sourab Ganguly also expressed his delight on the valuation of new teams. ‚ÄúIt is heartening to see the inclusion of two new teams at such a high valuation, and it reiterates the cricketing and financial strength of our cricket ecosystem,‚Äù said Sourav Ganguly. Chennai Super Kings won IPL 2021, whereas KKR remained the runner-up. The post ‚ÄúCricket has become the 2nd most popular sport on the planet‚Äù: Shane Warne lauds the valuation of two new IPL 2022 teams appeared first on The SportsRush.

title: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer must prioritise fixing Manchester United‚Äôs ‚Äòleaky‚Äô defensive set-up, says Paul Scholes
creator: Metro Sport Reporter
description: Can the Norwegian turn it around at Old Trafford?
content: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer is under intense pressure at Manchester United (Picture: Getty) Paul Scholes is hopeful Ole Gunnar Solskjaer can turn the dire situation around at Manchester United and believes his former team-mate must first look at fixing his ‚Äòleaky‚Äô defensive set-up in order to ‚Äòstop conceding chances and stop conceding goals‚Äô. The Red Devils suffered one of their most painful defeats of the Premier League era at the weekend as bitter rivals Liverpool thumped them 5-0 at Old Trafford, with Mohamed Salah completing a hat-trick and Naby Keita and Diogo Jota also scoring. It‚Äôs understood United‚Äôs board have considered sacking Solskjaer ahead of the side‚Äôs trip to Spurs and Antonio Conte, formerly head coach of Chelsea, Inter Milan and Juventus, is being heavily linked as a possible replacement. Scholes was scathing was his assessment of Sunday‚Äôs wretched performance, singling out Mason Greenwood for criticism while also suggesting that Paul Pogba may have played his final match for the club after his red card at the Theatre of Dreams. However, speaking to the Webby & O‚ÄôNeill YouTube channel 24 hours on from the loss, the legendary ex-United midfielder stressed that it was ‚Äòonly three points‚Äô and backed Solskjaer to ‚Äòtry and find a way forward‚Äô. Asked whether the Norwegian can turn it around, Scholes replied: ‚ÄòYou‚Äôd certainly hope so. It was a humiliating day for everyone involved with the club: the fans especially, the players worse I suppose and the manager worst of all. ‚ÄòHe will feel responsible for that. To be fair, I think when you‚Äôre playing against a team like Liverpool, the way the team was set up wasn‚Äôt quite right. ‚ÄòI and a few people saw it on the Wednesday night against Atalanta. Everyone got carried away a little bit with the performance in the second half from what was a first half that was really disappointing against a poor team. ‚ÄòAnd we played exactly the same way against Liverpool which I found surprising and we got what we deserved really. ‚ÄòCan he turn it around? I hope so. We played with Ole for years and he‚Äôs a resolute character. He came out fighting and at the end of the day it‚Äôs only three points. You don‚Äôt get anything more, you don‚Äôt get anything less. ‚ÄòIt‚Äôs a little bit embarrassing but now he‚Äôs got to try and galvanise the team and try and find a way forward. {"@context":"https:\/\/schema.org","@type":"VideoObject","name":"Metro.co.uk","duration":"T4M52S","thumbnailUrl":"https:\/\/i.dailymail.co.uk\/1s\/2021\/10\/25\/14\/49612909-0-image-a-41_1635169258844.jpg","uploadDate":"2021-10-25T14:41:25+0100","description":"Manchester United fans speak on the future of manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer outside Old Trafford, following a five goal thrashing at home against Liverpool.","contentUrl":"https:\/\/videos.metro.co.uk\/video\/met\/2021\/10\/25\/5288742974419519069\/480x270_MP4_5288742974419519069.mp4","height":270,"width":480} To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video ‚ÄòI think we‚Äôve got the players and the talent in the squad. Yesterday, yeah, you could say the gap was massive, but I think it was the way the team was set up. ‚ÄòIf he can set the team up in a way that isn‚Äôt as leaky or gives as much space to these better team then I think we‚Äôll have half a chance because there‚Äôs no doubt the talent in the forward areas is good, world-class at times. ‚ÄòYou‚Äôve got Cristiano [Ronaldo], brilliant goalscorer, young Mason [Greenwood], Marcus [Rashford], [Anthony] Martial coming back, so there‚Äôs some real talent in that squad. They just need to get the defensive side right and we know this team will score goals. ‚ÄòBut more importantly they have to stop conceding chances and stop conceding goals.‚Äô Scholes hopes his former United team-mate can turn the situation around (Picture: Getty) Scholes added: ‚ÄòPlayers sometimes get away with it and you have to say that the players really haven‚Äôt performed over these last three or four weeks,‚Äô he added. ‚ÄòOkay, the manager will bear the brunt of it, of course he will, and it‚Äôs up to him to turn it around. ‚ÄòThe fixtures aren‚Äôt as friendly as you would have liked: Tottenham away, Atalanta away and Manchester City at home. ‚ÄòIt‚Äôs three points, a disastrous day, but they‚Äôve got to fight back now. He has to find a way of stopping teams looking like they‚Äôre going to score goals against us.‚Äô More: FootballMan Utd include Brendan Rodgers on four-man shortlist to replace Ole Gunnar SolskjaerCristiano Ronaldo becoming 'irritated' with Man Utd teammate after Liverpool defeatJose Mourinho has given Man Utd board 'fear' over Antonio Conte appointment Scholes appears to fancy United‚Äôs chances ahead of their trip to the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium, with Spurs suffering back-to-back defeats away to Vitesse and West Ham. ‚ÄòThe players will be hurting and the manager will be devastated for these next two or three days, but you‚Äôve got to get over it,‚Äô he went on. ‚ÄòThere‚Äôs nothing you can do. Look forward to Tottenham and Tottenham aren‚Äôt a great team. ‚ÄòBut it‚Äôs going to be a difficult place to go with the form we‚Äôre in.‚Äô MORE : Antonio Conte makes decision over Manchester United job after initial talks with the club MORE : Manchester United defender Eric Bailly ‚Äòopenly challenged‚Äô Ole Gunnar Solskjaer for picking Harry Maguire

title: Spielplan der Handball-EM 2022: Alle Termine und Gruppen
description: Wann spielt Deutschland bei der Handball EM 2022? Alle Termine der Handball-Europameisterschaft der Herren in 2022 im Spielplan mit Datum und Uhrzeiten der einzelnen Partien finden Sie hier.
full_description: Die Handball-EM 2022 r√ºckt n√§her und Fans fragen sich: Wann spielt Deutschland? Wann beginnt die EM, wann steigt das Finale? Hier alle Termine und der Zeitplan zur Handball-Europameisterschaft der Herren in 2022 inklusive Datum und Uhrzeiten der einzelnen Partien im detaillierten Spielplan. Die Handball-Europameisterschaft der M√§nner findet im Januar 2022 in zwei L√§ndern statt: in Ungarn und der Slowakei. Es ist die 15. EM, die alle zwei Jahre stattfindet. Die Handball-EM 2022 wurde vom Kongress der Europ√§ischen Handballf√∂deration (EHF) vergeben am 20. Juni 2018 in Glasgow. Die gemeinsame Bewerbung von Ungarn und die Slowakei gewann gegen die Bewerbung von Frankreich , Belgien und Spanien . In diesem Artikel kl√§ren wir diese Fragen: Wann steigt die Handball-EM 2022 der Herren, was sind die Termine und wie sieht der Zeitplan aus? An welchem Datum und zu welcher Uhrzeit spielt Deutschland ? Welche Gruppen gibt es bei der Handball-Europameisterschaft ? In welcher Gruppe ist die deutsche Handball-Nationalmannschaft? Wann finden Vorrunde und Hauptrunde statt? Wann steigen Halbfinale, Spiel um Platz 5 sowie das Spiel um Platz 3? Wann findet das Finale der Handball-EM 2022 statt? Das sind die Teilnehmer und Gruppen der Handball-EM 2022 mit der Gruppe von Deutschland Das sind die Gruppen der Handball-Europameisterschaft der Herren 2022 in Ungarn und der Slowakei. title: Percat makes Walkinshaw Supercars return
full_description: Nick Percat will team up in Supercars with Chaz Mostert next year at Walkinshaw Andretti United. Supercars driver Nick Percat is going back to where it all began, signing with Walkinshaw Andretti United for the 2022 championship campaign. The 33-year-old has signed a multi-year deal with the former Holden factory team, joining fellow Bathurst 1000 winner Chaz Mostert in one of the most credentialed pairings on next year's grid. It's a homecoming of sorts for South Australian Percat, who came through the ranks at Walkinshaw Racing and won the Bathurst 1000 as Garth Tander's co-driver in 2011 for the then-Holden Racing Team. Percat debuted as a full-time driver with HRT in 2014 and would go on to finish third at Mt Panorama that year. After two seasons with Lucas Dumbrell Motorsport, Percat joined Brad Jones Racing for the 2017 championship and has been with the Albury-based team since then. In September he announced he was leaving BJR, just three months after signing a contract extension. "I'd just moved up here to the Gold Coast and I was pacing around my apartment. I rang Brad and had the conversation with him. I said I wasn't exactly happy anymore," Percat told Motorsport.com after his shock decision to quit BJR. "It was a surprise to both of us, but it was nothing personal against Brad or the team. "Something just changed in my head and I wanted to act on it, so I told him." The four-time Supercars race winner will form one of the strongest teams for the 2022 championship alongside Mostert - given Jamie Whincup's seat at Red Bull Ampol Racing is being taken by rookie Broc Feeney. Mostert, the 2014 Bathurst champion, has been with Walkinshaw for two years and is fourth in this year's championship standings heading into this weekend's Sydney SuperNight event at Sydney Motorsport Park. Australian Associated Press
